original: rgyu med pa las mi 'thad de ri bong gi rva dang 'dra bas gtan med pas so //
analyzed: rgyu med pa las mi 'thad de ri bong gi rva dang 'dra bas gtan med pas so //
translated: It is not tenable that it arises without a cause, because it would be like the horn of a rabbit and thus utterly nonexistent.

original: gnyis ka las kyang mi 'thad de /
analyzed: gnyis ka las kyang mi 'thad de /
translated: It is also not tenable that it arises from both.

original: sgrub pa'i phung po gsum pa dang dgag pa'i phung po gsum pa gnyis ka mi srid do //
analyzed: sgrub pa'i phung po gsum pa dang dgag pa'i phung po gsum pa gnyis ka mi srid do //
translated: A third heap of proof and a third heap of refutation are impossible.

original: gzhan las skye na 'das pa las sam /
analyzed: gzhan las skye na 'das pa las sam /
translated: If it arises from another, does it arise from the past,🔽the future,

original: ma 'ongs pa las sam /🔽da ltar ba las te /
analyzed: ma 'ongs pa las sam / da ltar ba las te /
translated: or the present?

original: de ltar mi 'thad de dus mnyam pa las rgyu 'bras mi srid do ;
analyzed: de ltar mi 'thad de dus mnyam pa las rgyu 'bras mi srid do ;
translated: It is not tenable that it arises from the present because cause and effect cannot be simultaneous.

original: / ma 'ongs pa las kyang mi 'thad de phyis 'byung ba'i phyir na rgyu nyid min no //
analyzed: / ma 'ongs pa las kyang mi 'thad de phyis 'byung ba'i phyir na rgyu nyid min no //
translated: It is also not tenable that it arises from the future because it would not be a cause since it would arise later.

original: 'o na 'das pa las skye'o zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na 'das pa las skye'o zhe na /
translated: Well, does it arise from the past?

original: zhig pa las sam ma zhig pa las skye zhe na /🔽zhig pa las ma yin te /
analyzed: zhig pa las sam ma zhig pa las skye zhe na / zhig pa las ma yin te /
translated: Does it arise from something that has disintegrated or from something that has not disintegrated?

original: med pa'i phyir ri bong gi rva dang 'dra'o //
analyzed: med pa'i phyir ri bong gi rva dang 'dra'o //
translated: It does not arise from something that has disintegrated because that is nonexistent, like the horn of a rabbit.

original: ma zhig pa las skye na dus mnyam par thal lo zhes sun 'don pa la phyogs snga ma rgyu'i dus nam zhig pa 'bras bu'i dus na zhig go zhe na /
analyzed: ma zhig pa las skye na dus mnyam par thal lo zhes sun 'don pa la phyogs snga ma rgyu'i dus nam zhig pa 'bras bu'i dus na zhig go zhe na /
translated: If it arises from something that has not disintegrated, it follows that they would be simultaneous.

original: de yang skad cig ma gzhan zhig gis chod dam mchod /
analyzed: de yang skad cig ma gzhan zhig gis chod dam mchod /
translated: Moreover, is it interrupted by another moment or not?

original: chod na snga ma zhig pa de skyed par byed pa'i rgyu med /
analyzed: chod na snga ma zhig pa de skyed par byed pa'i rgyu med /
translated: If it is interrupted, then the disintegration of the previous moment has no cause to generate it.

original: mchod na yang dus mnyam du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mchod na yang dus mnyam du 'gyur ro //
translated: If it is not interrupted, then they would be simultaneous.

original: byas pas de rang gi dus kyis chod kyi gzhan gyi dus kyis mchod do //
analyzed: byas pas de rang gi dus kyis chod kyi gzhan gyi dus kyis mchod do //
translated: Since it is produced, it is interrupted by its own time, but not by another time.

original: snga ma las skye ba dus mi mnyam par mi 'gyur ram zhe na /
analyzed: snga ma las skye ba dus mi mnyam par mi 'gyur ram zhe na /
translated: If it is produced from the previous moment, would it not be that the time is not the same?

original: rgyu 'bras gnyis la yang skad cig ma gsum gyis bsdus te /
analyzed: rgyu 'bras gnyis la yang skad cig ma gsum gyis bsdus te /
translated: Both cause and effect are included in three moments.

original: skye ba dang gnas pa dang 'jig cha gsum yod pas gzhan dus kyi mchod pa kho na'o //
analyzed: skye ba dang gnas pa dang 'jig cha gsum yod pas gzhan dus kyi mchod pa kho na'o //
translated: Since there are three parts—arising, enduring, and disintegrating—it is only interrupted by another time.

original: gang de skad cig ma yin na dngos po de gtan med par thal te ri bong gi rva bzhin no //
analyzed: gang de skad cig ma yin na dngos po de gtan med par thal te ri bong gi rva bzhin no //
translated: If it is momentary, it follows that that thing is utterly nonexistent, like the horn of a rabbit.

original: ngo bos gzugs med ni bum pa lta bu cig chos can du gzhag ste /
analyzed: ngo bos gzugs med ni bum pa lta bu cig chos can du gzhag ste /
translated: If it is essentially formless, then something like a pot is posited as the subject.

original: gcig dang du ma dang bral ba'i phyir yang dag par med de dper na sgyu ma la sogs pa bzhin no //
analyzed: gcig dang du ma dang bral ba'i phyir yang dag par med de dper na sgyu ma la sogs pa bzhin no //
translated: Because it is free from being one or many, it is not real, like an illusion, for example.

original: gzhan dag gtan tshigs ma grub ste /
analyzed: gzhan dag gtan tshigs ma grub ste /
translated: Others say that the reason is not established.

original: bum pa ni cha shas dang bcas pa'i dus yin la cha med pa gcig yin zhe na /
analyzed: bum pa ni cha shas dang bcas pa'i dus yin la cha med pa gcig yin zhe na /
translated: If you say that a pot is a part-possessor at the time when it has parts, but is partless when it is one,

original: dang po ltar yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: dang po ltar yod pa ma yin te /
translated: it does not exist in the first way.

original: gcig ma yin te cha shas du ma yod pa'i phyir /
analyzed: gcig ma yin te cha shas du ma yod pa'i phyir /
translated: It is not one because it has many parts.

original: cha shas kyi du ma yang ma grub ste phyogs gcig rang la yang cha drug yod pas so //
analyzed: cha shas kyi du ma yang ma grub ste phyogs gcig rang la yang cha drug yod pas so //
translated: Many parts are not established because even in one direction there are six parts.

original: phyogs gcig med pas cha shas kyi du ma med do //
analyzed: phyogs gcig med pas cha shas kyi du ma med do //
translated: Since one direction does not exist, many parts do not exist.

original: yang kha cig rdul phra rab yod do zhes @256b zer na yang cha shas yod dam med brtags te /
analyzed: yang kha cig rdul phra rab yod do zhes @256b zer na yang cha shas yod dam med brtags te /
translated: Again, if someone says that subtle particles exist, they should be examined to see whether they have parts or not.

original: yod na snga ma dang 'dra'o //
analyzed: yod na snga ma dang 'dra'o //
translated: If they do, it is the same as before.

original: cha shas med na ni cha shas med pa'i phyir dngos po gzugs med du thal te sems dang sems las byung ba bzhin no //
analyzed: cha shas med na ni cha shas med pa'i phyir dngos po gzugs med du thal te sems dang sems las byung ba bzhin no //
translated: If they do not have parts, it follows that they are not things with form because they are partless, like the mind and mental factors.

original: de bzhin du lta ba po'i gang zag kyang med do //
analyzed: de bzhin du lta ba po'i gang zag kyang med do //
translated: In the same way, the person who sees does not exist.

original: de bzhin du sgra la sogs pa la yang sbyor ro //
analyzed: de bzhin du sgra la sogs pa la yang sbyor ro //
translated: The same should be applied to sound and so on.

original: 'ga' zhig sems yang dag tu 'dod do zhe na /
analyzed: 'ga' zhig sems yang dag tu 'dod do zhe na /
translated: If someone asserts that the mind is real,

original: sems med sems las byung ba med //
analyzed: sems med sems las byung ba med //
translated: there is no mind and no mental factors.

original: ces snga ma dang 'dra ba'i rigs pa ma grub po //
analyzed: ces snga ma dang 'dra ba'i rigs pa ma grub po //
translated: The reasoning is not established as in the previous case.

original: de skad du /
analyzed: de skad du /
translated: It is said:

original: gzugs khams zhes bya stong pa ste /
analyzed: gzugs khams zhes bya stong pa ste /
translated: The so-called form realm is empty,

original: de nyid du ni sgra yang bya //
analyzed: de nyid du ni sgra yang bya //
translated: and sound is also in that very [realm].

original: zhes pa nas /
analyzed: zhes pa nas /

original: dmigs zhes bya ba stong pa ste /
analyzed: dmigs zhes bya ba stong pa ste /
translated: The so-called object is empty,

original: dbus su rnam shes ji ltar 'gyur //
analyzed: dbus su rnam shes ji ltar 'gyur //
translated: how can consciousness be in the middle?

original: rna ba zhes bya ba stong pa yin //
analyzed: rna ba zhes bya ba stong pa yin //
translated: The so-called ear is empty,

original: bar na rnam shes ji ltar mchis //
analyzed: bar na rnam shes ji ltar mchis //
translated: how can consciousness be in between?🔽...

original: zhes pa rgya cher gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes pa rgya cher gsungs so //
translated: Thus it is extensively taught.

original: thun mong shes rab kyi lta ba dbu ma dang cha mthun par gtan la 'bebs pa /
analyzed: thun mong shes rab kyi lta ba dbu ma dang cha mthun par gtan la 'bebs pa /
translated: The common view is established in accordance with the Madhyamaka,

original: rang rig sems tsam dang cha mthun par ston te /
analyzed: rang rig sems tsam dang cha mthun par ston te /
translated: and self-awareness is taught in accordance with the Cittamātra.

original: le'u brgyad par 'chad par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: le'u brgyad par 'chad par 'gyur ro //
translated: This will be explained in chapter eight.

original: lta ba thun mong ma yin pa thabs gtsor byas pa bde ba chen po shes pa ste /🔽skyed byed ma dang zhes bya ba la sogs pas ston to //
analyzed: lta ba thun mong ma yin pa thabs gtsor byas pa bde ba chen po shes pa ste / skyed byed ma dang zhes bya ba la sogs pas ston to //
translated: The uncommon view is the knowledge of great bliss that emphasizes method.🔽It is taught by [verses] beginning with the mother who gives birth...

original: skyed byed ma dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni bsgom pa dang spyod pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: skyed byed ma dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni bsgom pa dang spyod pa yin no zhe na /
translated: If it is said that the mother who gives birth... and so forth are meditation and conduct,

original: bden te 'on kyang thun mong ma yin pa'i skabs su thabs gtsor byas te /
analyzed: bden te 'on kyang thun mong ma yin pa'i skabs su thabs gtsor byas te /
translated: True, but in the uncommon context, method is emphasized.🔽This is because the view is generated by wisdom.

original: lta ba shes rab bskyed pa yin pa'i phyir dang yang na bsgom pa'i thabs yin yang /
analyzed: lta ba shes rab bskyed pa yin pa'i phyir dang yang na bsgom pa'i thabs yin yang /
translated: Or, even though it is a method of meditation,

original: lta ba nyams su len pa'i thabs gtsor byas te /
analyzed: lta ba nyams su len pa'i thabs gtsor byas te /
translated: it is emphasized as a method of practicing the view.

original: yid so sor rtog pa'i shes rab bskyed pa'i phyir som nyi mi bya'o //
analyzed: yid so sor rtog pa'i shes rab bskyed pa'i phyir som nyi mi bya'o //
translated: Therefore, one should not be skeptical because the wisdom of mental discernment is generated.

original: de yang gsum ste gzhan lus shes rab ste 'og sgo la brten pa dang / rang lus thabs te steng sgo la brten pa dang / de kho na nyid shes rab mi dmigs pa dang sbyar ba'o //🔽de la shes rab la brten pa yang gnyis te /
analyzed: de yang gsum ste gzhan lus shes rab ste 'og sgo la brten pa dang / rang lus thabs te steng sgo la brten pa dang / de kho na nyid shes rab mi dmigs pa dang sbyar ba'o // de la shes rab la brten pa yang gnyis te /
translated: There are three: the wisdom of another’s body, which is based on the lower door; the method of one’s own body, which is based on the upper door; and the wisdom of reality, which is applied to nonapprehending.

original: las dang po pa dang las smin pa'o //
analyzed: las dang po pa dang las smin pa'o //
translated: The first is also twofold: the beginner and the one with experience.

original: las dang po pas ni ma zhes pas ni rang gis de la dbang nos pa'o //
analyzed: las dang po pas ni ma zhes pas ni rang gis de la dbang nos pa'o //
translated: The beginner is as follows: “Mother” means that one takes power over her oneself.

original: sring mo ni dbang lhan cig nos pa'o //
analyzed: sring mo ni dbang lhan cig nos pa'o //
translated: “Sister” means that one takes power together.

original: bu mo ni rang gis dbang bskur ba'o //
analyzed: bu mo ni rang gis dbang bskur ba'o //
translated: “Daughter” means that one empowers oneself.

original: rtag tu mchod ces pa ni dbang gi dus su ji ltar rgyun mi 'chad par ro //
analyzed: rtag tu mchod ces pa ni dbang gi dus su ji ltar rgyun mi 'chad par ro //
translated: Always worship means just as at the time of initiation, so without break.

original: rnal 'byor rig pa zhes pa ni bla ma'i man ngag brjod pa'o //
analyzed: rnal 'byor rig pa zhes pa ni bla ma'i man ngag brjod pa'o //
translated: The yogin is the one who knows the guru's instructions.

original: gar ma ni shes rab che ba'o //
analyzed: gar ma ni shes rab che ba'o //
translated: The dancer is the one with great wisdom.

original: chos ma ni dad pa che bas bsgyur sla ba'o //
analyzed: chos ma ni dad pa che bas bsgyur sla ba'o //
translated: The dharma woman is the one who is easily transformed by great faith.

original: rdo rje ma ni bsam gtan gyis bstan pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje ma ni bsam gtan gyis bstan pa'o //
translated: The vajra woman is the one who is taught by means of concentration.

original: @257a * // gdol pa mo ni brtson 'grus kyi phyag rgya ste dpa' ba'o //
analyzed: @257a * // gdol pa mo ni brtson 'grus kyi phyag rgya ste dpa' ba'o //
translated: The outcaste woman is the one who is a hero, the mudra of diligence.

original: bram ze ma ni ngang tshul bzang bas bzod pa can te /
analyzed: bram ze ma ni ngang tshul bzang bas bzod pa can te /
translated: The brahmin woman is the one who is patient, of good character.

original: chos de rnams gang yang rung ba dang ldan pa'i las kyi phyag rgya bdag med mar bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi cho ga yin la thabs kyi cho ga ni rang nyid dgyes pa'i rdo rje bsgom mo //
analyzed: chos de rnams gang yang rung ba dang ldan pa'i las kyi phyag rgya bdag med mar bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi cho ga yin la thabs kyi cho ga ni rang nyid dgyes pa'i rdo rje bsgom mo //
translated: The meditation on the karma mudra endowed with any of those dharmas as Nairatmya is the rite of wisdom. The rite of method is meditating on oneself as Hevajra.

original: de nyid rigs pas rtag tu mchod //
analyzed: de nyid rigs pas rtag tu mchod //
translated: Worship always with that reasoning.

original: ces pa ni zla ba gzung ba dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: ces pa ni zla ba gzung ba dang ldan pa'o //
translated: This is the one who possesses the grasped moon.

original: ji ltar dbye bar mi 'gyur ba ni gsang ba'i tshul lo //
analyzed: ji ltar dbye bar mi 'gyur ba ni gsang ba'i tshul lo //
translated: How is it that it is not divided? It is the secret way.

original: rab tu 'bad pa ni dam pa la dmigs pa'i man ngag dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: rab tu 'bad pa ni dam pa la dmigs pa'i man ngag dang ldan pa'o //
translated: Great effort is having the instruction that focuses on the sublime.

original: bsten pa nyid ces pa ni 'dod pa'i yon tan nam /
analyzed: bsten pa nyid ces pa ni 'dod pa'i yon tan nam /
translated: The very reliance is the pledge of the qualities of desire,

original: bza' ba la sogs pa'i dam tshig go //
analyzed: bza' ba la sogs pa'i dam tshig go //
translated: or the pledge of food, and so forth.

original: ma gsang zhes pa ni mtshon pa ste /
analyzed: ma gsang zhes pa ni mtshon pa ste /
translated: The not secret is an indication;

original: ma 'bad cing ma bsten par 'gyur na'o //
analyzed: ma 'bad cing ma bsten par 'gyur na'o //
translated: if one does not make effort and does not rely on it.

original: sbrul dang chom rkun zhes pa ni tshe 'di'i nyes pa'o //
analyzed: sbrul dang chom rkun zhes pa ni tshe 'di'i nyes pa'o //
translated: The snake and robber is the fault of this life.

original: sa spyod me yis sdug bsngal byed //
analyzed: sa spyod me yis sdug bsngal byed //
translated: The suffering of the earth and fire

original: ces pa ni shi nas dmyal ba ste skye ba gzhan gyis nyes pa'o //
analyzed: ces pa ni shi nas dmyal ba ste skye ba gzhan gyis nyes pa'o //
translated: is the fault of another birth, after death in hell.

original: las smin cing rdzogs pas ni /🔽skyed byed ma la sogs pa ni bgrod dang bgrod min du shes par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: las smin cing rdzogs pas ni / skyed byed ma la sogs pa ni bgrod dang bgrod min du shes par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: The ripening and completion of karma🔽is the fault of another life, after death in hell.

original: las kyi phyag rgya dang tha mal ba nyid la bya'o //
analyzed: las kyi phyag rgya dang tha mal ba nyid la bya'o //
translated: The mother who gives birth and so forth are to be known as the action seal and the ordinary woman, in order to know what is to be traversed and what is not to be traversed.

original: thabs dang shes rab cho ga la sogs pa ni las dang po pa dang mthun no //
analyzed: thabs dang shes rab cho ga la sogs pa ni las dang po pa dang mthun no //
translated: The method and wisdom and so forth are in accord with the beginner.

original: rang lus thabs kyi steng sgo la brten pas ni skyed byed ma ste ;
analyzed: rang lus thabs kyi steng sgo la brten pas ni skyed byed ma ste ;
translated: The mother who gives birth is based on the upper door of the method of one's own body,

original: / g-yon gyi rkyang ma nas rgyu ba'i rlung ngo //
analyzed: / g-yon gyi rkyang ma nas rgyu ba'i rlung ngo //
translated: The one on the left is the energy current moving through the lalanā.

original: sring mo nyid g-yas kyi ro ma nas rgyu ba'i rlung ngo //
analyzed: sring mo nyid g-yas kyi ro ma nas rgyu ba'i rlung ngo //
translated: The one on the right is the energy current moving through the rasanā.

original: rnal 'byor rigs pas rtag tu mchod //
analyzed: rnal 'byor rigs pas rtag tu mchod //
translated: The yogi should always worship them.

original: ces pa ni dbus aa wa dh'u t'i ru lhan cig skyes pa'i rlung du sbyor ba'o //
analyzed: ces pa ni dbus aa wa dh'u t'i ru lhan cig skyes pa'i rlung du sbyor ba'o //
translated: This means that the energy current of innate joy is united in the central avadhūti.

original: gar ma ni mig dang 'brel pa myur ba'i rlung ngo //
analyzed: gar ma ni mig dang 'brel pa myur ba'i rlung ngo //
translated: The dancer is the energy current in the eyes, which is swift.

original: tshos ma ni rna ba dang 'brel pa bsgyur ba'i rlung ngo //🔽rdo rje ma ni sna dang 'brel pa brtan pa'i rlung ngo //
analyzed: tshos ma ni rna ba dang 'brel pa bsgyur ba'i rlung ngo // rdo rje ma ni sna dang 'brel pa brtan pa'i rlung ngo //
translated: The washerwoman is the energy current in the ears, which is changeable.🔽The vajra woman is the energy current in the nose, which is stable.

original: gdol pa mo ni lce dang 'brel pa bag tsha ba med pa'i rlung ngo //
analyzed: gdol pa mo ni lce dang 'brel pa bag tsha ba med pa'i rlung ngo //
translated: The untouchable woman is the energy current in the tongue, which is fearless.

original: bram ze ma ni lus dang 'brel pa nyes pa dag pa'i rlung ngo //
analyzed: bram ze ma ni lus dang 'brel pa nyes pa dag pa'i rlung ngo //
translated: The brahmin woman is the energy current in the body, which is pure of faults.

original: thabs kyi cho ga ni rlung de rnams kyis mi g-yo mi 'gog par yul rnams la bde bar sbyor ba'o //
analyzed: thabs kyi cho ga ni rlung de rnams kyis mi g-yo mi 'gog par yul rnams la bde bar sbyor ba'o //
translated: The rite of method is to unite with the objects of those energy currents without moving or blocking them.

original: shes rab kyi cho ga ni de rnams bsdus te rang bzhin med par bya ste /
analyzed: shes rab kyi cho ga ni de rnams bsdus te rang bzhin med par bya ste /
translated: The rite of wisdom is to gather them in and make them free of intrinsic nature.

original: aa wa dh'u t'i ra lhan cig skyes pa'i rlung du sbyor ba'o //
analyzed: aa wa dh'u t'i ra lhan cig skyes pa'i rlung du sbyor ba'o //
translated: The union of the avadhūtī and the innate wind is the “union of the mother and sister.”

original: de nyid rig par rtag tu mchod ni cho ga de rnams dang ldan pa rgyun du rnal 'byor du byed pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid rig par rtag tu mchod ni cho ga de rnams dang ldan pa rgyun du rnal 'byor du byed pa'o //
translated: “Always worshiping the knowledge of reality” is the constant yoga endowed with those rites.

original: ji ltar dbye bar mi 'gyur zhes pa ni @257b thabs dang shes rab sbyor ba'o //
analyzed: ji ltar dbye bar mi 'gyur zhes pa ni @257b thabs dang shes rab sbyor ba'o //
translated: “How can there be no division?” is the union of method and wisdom.

original: rab tu 'bad ces pa ni lus ngag yid gsum gyi brtson 'grus so //
analyzed: rab tu 'bad ces pa ni lus ngag yid gsum gyi brtson 'grus so //
translated: “Exertion” is the effort of body, speech, and mind.

original: brten pa nyid ni shes par bya'o //
analyzed: brten pa nyid ni shes par bya'o //
translated: “One should know the support” is the support of the mind.

original: ma gsang zhes pa ni rang gi ma'i rnam par rtog pa'o //
analyzed: ma gsang zhes pa ni rang gi ma'i rnam par rtog pa'o //
translated: “Not secret” is the concept of one’s mother.

original: sprul dang chem rkun la sogs pa ni rnam rtog las sprul pa'i nyes pa ste /
analyzed: sprul dang chem rkun la sogs pa ni rnam rtog las sprul pa'i nyes pa ste /
translated: “Emanation, theft, and so on” are the faults emanated from concepts.

original: rmi lam gyi sdug bsngal bzhin no //
analyzed: rmi lam gyi sdug bsngal bzhin no //
translated: They are like the suffering of a dream.

original: de kho na nyid shes rab dang sbyar ba ni /🔽skyed byed ma ni sems so //
analyzed: de kho na nyid shes rab dang sbyar ba ni / skyed byed ma ni sems so //
translated: The union with the wisdom of reality is as follows:🔽“The mother who gives birth” is the mind.

original: sring mo nyid ni sems las byung ba'o //
analyzed: sring mo nyid ni sems las byung ba'o //
translated: “The sister” is the mental factors.

original: rnal 'byor rig pa zhes pa ni sems dang sems las byung ba de dag med cing 'gog pa ma yin te //
analyzed: rnal 'byor rig pa zhes pa ni sems dang sems las byung ba de dag med cing 'gog pa ma yin te //
translated: “The yoga of knowledge” is the cessation of the mind and mental factors.

original: ma ste thabs dang shes rab la ma brten gzhan la 'gog pa sbyar ba de nyid chags bral lta bu gnyug ma'i dbang por bde ba chen po rang 'byung ba'o //
analyzed: ma ste thabs dang shes rab la ma brten gzhan la 'gog pa sbyar ba de nyid chags bral lta bu gnyug ma'i dbang por bde ba chen po rang 'byung ba'o //
translated: The “mother” is the innate organ, which is the great bliss that arises by itself, like the freedom from attachment, not depending on the method and wisdom, but applied to the other.

original: rtag tu mchod ces pa ni dbang po rang snang rgyun mi 'chad pa'i man ngag go //
analyzed: rtag tu mchod ces pa ni dbang po rang snang rgyun mi 'chad pa'i man ngag go //
translated: “Always worship” is the intimate instruction of the uninterrupted self-appearance of the sense organs.

original: gar ma ni gzugs dang mig gi dbang po'o //
analyzed: gar ma ni gzugs dang mig gi dbang po'o //
translated: The dancer is form and the eye sense organ.

original: tshos ma ni sgra dang rna ba'i dbang po'o //🔽rdo rje ma ni dri dang sna'i dbang po'o //
analyzed: tshos ma ni sgra dang rna ba'i dbang po'o // rdo rje ma ni dri dang sna'i dbang po'o //
translated: The washerwoman is sound and the ear sense organ.🔽The vajra lady is smell and the nose sense organ.

original: gdol pa mo ni ro dang lce'i dbang po'o //
analyzed: gdol pa mo ni ro dang lce'i dbang po'o //
translated: The caṇḍālī is taste and the tongue sense organ.

original: bram ze ma ni reg bya dang lus kyi dbang po'o //
analyzed: bram ze ma ni reg bya dang lus kyi dbang po'o //
translated: The brahmin lady is touch and the body sense organ.

original: thabs dang shes rab cho ga yis //
analyzed: thabs dang shes rab cho ga yis //
translated: The method and wisdom rite

original: zhes pa ni phyag rgya chen po'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ni phyag rgya chen po'o //
translated: is the great seal.

original: de yang de nyid rig pas zhes pa ni gnyug ma'i dbang po der bde ba chen po rang gsal ba'o //
analyzed: de yang de nyid rig pas zhes pa ni gnyug ma'i dbang po der bde ba chen po rang gsal ba'o //
translated: Moreover, “knowing reality” is the self-appearance of the innate sense organ, the great bliss.

original: rtag tu mchod ces pa ni dbang po rang snang gi man ngag go //
analyzed: rtag tu mchod ces pa ni dbang po rang snang gi man ngag go //
translated: “Always worship” is the intimate instruction of the self-appearance of the sense organs.

original: ji ltar dbye bar mi 'gyur bar //
analyzed: ji ltar dbye bar mi 'gyur bar //
translated: How is it that it is not differentiated?

original: zhes pa ni lhan cig skyes pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: zhes pa ni lhan cig skyes pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because of the connateness.

original: rab tu 'bad pa'i zhes pa ni de yang bla ma'i man ngag gis thob pas so //
analyzed: rab tu 'bad pa'i zhes pa ni de yang bla ma'i man ngag gis thob pas so //
translated: “With great effort” means that is also attained through the guru’s instructions.

original: rten pa nyid ces pa ni shes rab lha mo bla na med pa dang 'dod pa'i yon tan no //
analyzed: rten pa nyid ces pa ni shes rab lha mo bla na med pa dang 'dod pa'i yon tan no //
translated: “The support” is the goddess of wisdom, the unsurpassed, and the sense pleasures.

original: ma gsang zhes bya ba ni mtshon pa ste ma 'bad na ma brten na'o //
analyzed: ma gsang zhes bya ba ni mtshon pa ste ma 'bad na ma brten na'o //
translated: “Not secret” is an indication of not exerting oneself, not relying.

original: de yang mu dra chen po dang dbang po rang snang gi man ngag mi ldan par spyod pa la 'jug pa'o //
analyzed: de yang mu dra chen po dang dbang po rang snang gi man ngag mi ldan par spyod pa la 'jug pa'o //
translated: Moreover, it is engaging in conduct without the instructions of the great mudra and the natural manifestation of the sense organs.

original: des na sprul dang chom rkun la sogs pa ni log pa'i brtul zhugs spyang pa'i nyes dmigs so //
analyzed: des na sprul dang chom rkun la sogs pa ni log pa'i brtul zhugs spyang pa'i nyes dmigs so //
translated: Therefore, the emanations, thieves, and so on are the faults of engaging in the wrong conduct.

original: las kyi phyag rgya de dag tha mal spong ba'i phyir phyag rgyas gdab pa gang gi phyir zhe na /
analyzed: las kyi phyag rgya de dag tha mal spong ba'i phyir phyag rgyas gdab pa gang gi phyir zhe na /
translated: In order to abandon those ordinary karmamudras, what is the purpose of the seal?

original: thar pa'i rgyur ni brjod par bya //
analyzed: thar pa'i rgyur ni brjod par bya //
translated: It is said to be the cause of liberation.

original: zhes pa'o // gang dag gis she na /
analyzed: zhes pa'o // gang dag gis she na /
translated: By what?

original: rigs lnga'i zhes pa ste /
analyzed: rigs lnga'i zhes pa ste /
translated: The five families.

original: rdo rje padma la sogs pa tshigs su bcad pa gcig ste /
analyzed: rdo rje padma la sogs pa tshigs su bcad pa gcig ste /
translated: The vajra, lotus, and so on are one verse.

original: gang ltar dang zhe na /
analyzed: gang ltar dang zhe na /
translated: How so?

original: rdo rje 'dis ni zhes pa ste /
analyzed: rdo rje 'dis ni zhes pa ste /
translated: By this vajra,

original: tshig rkang gnyis kyis so //
analyzed: tshig rkang gnyis kyis so //
translated: by the two lines.

original: de yang rdo rje la sogs @258a * //
analyzed: de yang rdo rje la sogs @258a * //
translated: And that is the seal of which vajra, etc.

original: pa gang la gang gis rgyas btab pas /
analyzed: pa gang la gang gis rgyas btab pas /
translated: By which seal, of which consort,

original: de de'i rang bzhin du gyur pas tha mal pa spangs nas thar pa'i rgyur 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: de de'i rang bzhin du gyur pas tha mal pa spangs nas thar pa'i rgyur 'gyur ba'o //
translated: she becomes of that nature, and so, abandoning the ordinary, becomes the cause of liberation.

original: de la slob dpon kha cig ni gsang ba'i gnas kyis rgyas btab pa la 'dod de /
analyzed: de la slob dpon kha cig ni gsang ba'i gnas kyis rgyas btab pa la 'dod de /
translated: On this, some masters assert the seal of the secret place,

original: 'dir mthun pa ma yin no //
analyzed: 'dir mthun pa ma yin no //
translated: but that is not appropriate here.

original: gang la zhe na ;
analyzed: gang la zhe na ;
translated: Of which?

original: / rdo rje'i phyag rgyas g-yung mo nyid //
analyzed: / rdo rje'i phyag rgyas g-yung mo nyid //
translated: The seal of the vajra is the female of the cuckoo,

original: la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gcig ste /
analyzed: la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gcig ste /
translated: and so on, one verse.

original: de rnams kyang gnyis pa'i don gyis dang por shes par bya'o //
analyzed: de rnams kyang gnyis pa'i don gyis dang por shes par bya'o //
translated: And those should be known in the first place by the meaning of the second.

original: gar ma la sogs pa ni de ltar yin na /
analyzed: gar ma la sogs pa ni de ltar yin na /
translated: If the dancer, etc. are so,

original: skyed byed ma la sogs pa ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: skyed byed ma la sogs pa ji lta bu zhe na /
translated: what of the mother who gives birth, etc.?🔽On this he says,

original: 'di rnams zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: 'di rnams zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
translated: and so on.🔽And there,

original: der yang / mdor bsdus par ni brjod par bya //
analyzed: der yang / mdor bsdus par ni brjod par bya //
translated: it should be stated in brief.

original: zhes pa ni rdo rje 'chang rigs drug pa'o //🔽'di rnams zhes bya ba ni sngar gyi'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ni rdo rje 'chang rigs drug pa'o // 'di rnams zhes bya ba ni sngar gyi'o //
translated: This is Vajradhara, the sixth buddha.🔽These, etc.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs zhes pa ni /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs zhes pa ni /
translated: The Tathagata family is

original: rdo rje 'chang yin yang sku gsung thugs kyi rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rdo rje 'chang yin yang sku gsung thugs kyi rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Vajradhara, because he is the nature of body, speech, and mind.

original: de bshad pa'i phyir dpal ldan zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: de bshad pa'i phyir dpal ldan zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
translated: In order to explain that, he says glorious, etc.

original: de yang dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang bde ba chen po'i sku'o //
analyzed: de yang dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang bde ba chen po'i sku'o //
translated: That is, glorious Vajradhara, the body of great bliss.

original: de bzhin nyid gshegs shing zhes pa ni chos kyi skur te //
analyzed: de bzhin nyid gshegs shing zhes pa ni chos kyi skur te //
translated: Gone to suchness, i.e., to the body of reality,

original: skyed byed ma la rgyas gdab pa'o //
analyzed: skyed byed ma la rgyas gdab pa'o //
translated: he seals the mother who gives rise to him.

original: de bzhin slar yang gshegs pa nyid //
analyzed: de bzhin slar yang gshegs pa nyid //
translated: And again, he goes forth,

original: ces pa ni gzugs sku slar byung ba ste /🔽longs skus sring mo la rgyas gdab pa'o //
analyzed: ces pa ni gzugs sku slar byung ba ste / longs skus sring mo la rgyas gdab pa'o //
translated: i.e., the body of form arises again.🔽The body of enjoyment seals the sister.

original: sprul skus bu mo la'o //
analyzed: sprul skus bu mo la'o //
translated: The emanation body seals the daughter.

original: shes rab rig pa 'di yis ni //
analyzed: shes rab rig pa 'di yis ni //
translated: By this knowledge of wisdom,

original: chos kyi sku dang thabs kyi rig pas gzugs sku longs skus mtshon no //
analyzed: chos kyi sku dang thabs kyi rig pas gzugs sku longs skus mtshon no //
translated: the body of reality is illustrated by the knowledge of means, the body of form by the body of enjoyment,🔽and the emanation body by the daughter.

original: dbyer med rigs pa 'di yis ni sprul sku mtshon no //
analyzed: dbyer med rigs pa 'di yis ni sprul sku mtshon no //
translated: This reasoning of inseparability illustrates the nirmāṇakāya.

original: de bzhin gshegs zhes brjod par bya //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs zhes brjod par bya //
translated: It is said to be the Tathāgata.

original: zhes pa ni rdo rje 'chang bde chen gyi sku yin yang /
analyzed: zhes pa ni rdo rje 'chang bde chen gyi sku yin yang /
translated: Although Vajradhara is the body of great bliss,

original: de'i chos sku gsum gyi rigs pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su btags so //
analyzed: de'i chos sku gsum gyi rigs pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su btags so //
translated: his dharmakāya is designated as the Tathāgata family by the reasoning of the three buddha bodies.

original: 'o na rigs rnams du yod ce na /
analyzed: 'o na rigs rnams du yod ce na /
translated: Now, how many families are there?

original: rigs ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa tshigs su bcad pa gcig gi dbye ba dang bsdu bas /
analyzed: rigs ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa tshigs su bcad pa gcig gi dbye ba dang bsdu bas /
translated: One verse on the analysis and summary of the families.

original: gcig nyid drug dang lnga dang gsum du bstan te //
analyzed: gcig nyid drug dang lnga dang gsum du bstan te //
translated: The one is taught as six, five, and three.

original: de yang dag pa'i gnas skabs na rnam par rtogs rigs su dbye ba med bzhin du dbye ba ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: de yang dag pa'i gnas skabs na rnam par rtogs rigs su dbye ba med bzhin du dbye ba ji lta bu zhe na /
translated: If there is no division of the family in the state of purity, how is there a division in the state of impurity?

original: bden te ma dag pa'i gnas skabs kyi dbye bas @258b rnam par gzhag pa'i phyir /
analyzed: bden te ma dag pa'i gnas skabs kyi dbye bas @258b rnam par gzhag pa'i phyir /
translated: It is true that the division is established by the division of the impure state.

original: rigs dang 'byung ba la sogs pa tshigs su bcad pa gcig gsungs sa //
analyzed: rigs dang 'byung ba la sogs pa tshigs su bcad pa gcig gsungs sa //
translated: One verse on the analysis of the family, the element, etc.

original: spyir rigs tha dad par 'jog pa kun rdzob /
analyzed: spyir rigs tha dad par 'jog pa kun rdzob /
translated: In general, the establishment of the different families is conventional.

original: rigs gcig pa don dam pa yin te /
analyzed: rigs gcig pa don dam pa yin te /
translated: The one family is ultimate.

original: tha dad pa ni chu bo bzhin //
analyzed: tha dad pa ni chu bo bzhin //
translated: Different, like rivers.

original: du ma nyid du brjod mi bya //
analyzed: du ma nyid du brjod mi bya //
translated: Do not say they are many.

original: zhes so // la la dag ni ji srid du khas len pa de srid du gzhan sel bar gnas te /
analyzed: zhes so // la la dag ni ji srid du khas len pa de srid du gzhan sel bar gnas te /
translated: Some, as long as they accept, remain in the exclusion of other.

original: dper na rgyu'i tshogs pa tha dad pa las 'bras bu tha dad par snang ste /
analyzed: dper na rgyu'i tshogs pa tha dad pa las 'bras bu tha dad par snang ste /
translated: For example, from a different collection of causes, a different effect appears.

original: dper na mar me tha dad pas sel ba'i mun pa gcig las med kyang mar me ni gcig tu gyur pa ma yin no //
analyzed: dper na mar me tha dad pas sel ba'i mun pa gcig las med kyang mar me ni gcig tu gyur pa ma yin no //
translated: For example, from different lamps, there is not only one exclusion of darkness, but the lamps are not one.🔽And that is said:

original: de yang / tshogs dang chos kyi sku dag dang / 'gro ba'i don rnams spyod pa ni //
analyzed: de yang / tshogs dang chos kyi sku dag dang / 'gro ba'i don rnams spyod pa ni //
translated: The collection, the Dharma body, and the performance of the aims of beings

original: sangs rgyas thams cad mtshungs pa yin //🔽zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: sangs rgyas thams cad mtshungs pa yin // zhes gsungs so //
translated: are the same for all Buddhas.

original: rigs pas dpyad na ni yid kyi spyod yul du shin tu dga' bas chog go //
analyzed: rigs pas dpyad na ni yid kyi spyod yul du shin tu dga' bas chog go //
translated: If analyzed by reasoning, the mental object is very delightful.

original: da ni bsgom pa'i nyams bstan pa'i phyir sgom pa med ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: da ni bsgom pa'i nyams bstan pa'i phyir sgom pa med ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
translated: Now, in order to teach the experience of meditation, he says “non-meditation” and so on.

original: de yang lta ba shes rab kyi skabs su mig gi dbang po la sogs pa gcig dang du bral rigs pas rang bzhin med pa'i phyir sgom pa po med ces pa'o //🔽yang lta ba'i skabs su gzugs la sogs pa med pa'i phyir bsgom pa yang med ces lhag ma'o ;
analyzed: de yang lta ba shes rab kyi skabs su mig gi dbang po la sogs pa gcig dang du bral rigs pas rang bzhin med pa'i phyir sgom pa po med ces pa'o // yang lta ba'i skabs su gzugs la sogs pa med pa'i phyir bsgom pa yang med ces lhag ma'o ;
translated: Moreover, in the context of the view of wisdom, since the eye faculty and so on are devoid of nature by reasoning of being neither one nor many, there is no meditator.

original: / bsgom bya med ces bya ba ni'ang ste /
analyzed: / bsgom bya med ces bya ba ni'ang ste /
translated: Moreover, in the context of the view, since form and so on do not exist, meditation also does not exist.

original: snga ma gnyis lta bu'o //
analyzed: snga ma gnyis lta bu'o //
translated: The remainder is the same as the previous two.

original: de yang lta ba'i skabs su sems dang sems las byung ba rang bzhin med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de yang lta ba'i skabs su sems dang sems las byung ba rang bzhin med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Moreover, in the context of the view, since mind and mental factors are devoid of nature, there is nothing to meditate on.

original: 'on te bsgom pa ni lam gyi gtso bo yin na /
analyzed: 'on te bsgom pa ni lam gyi gtso bo yin na /
translated: If meditation is the principal part of the path,

original: de med na 'bras bu dang lam gzhan dag ji ltar yod par 'gyur zhe na /🔽de'i phyir / lha dang sngags kyang yod ma yin //
analyzed: de med na 'bras bu dang lam gzhan dag ji ltar yod par 'gyur zhe na / de'i phyir / lha dang sngags kyang yod ma yin //
translated: how can the result and other aspects of the path exist if it does not?🔽Therefore it is said:

original: zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes gsungs so //
translated: Even gods and mantras do not exist.

original: de yang 'bras bu gzhan dag nye bar mtshon pa ste /
analyzed: de yang 'bras bu gzhan dag nye bar mtshon pa ste /
translated: Moreover, the other results are illustrated:

original: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyang yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyang yod pa ma yin no //
translated: Even the Bhagavān Buddha does not exist.

original: lam yang gzhan dag nye bar mtshon pa ste /
analyzed: lam yang gzhan dag nye bar mtshon pa ste /
translated: The path is also indicated as something else.

original: phyag rgya dang dkyil 'khor dang sgrub pa dang phrin las kyang yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: phyag rgya dang dkyil 'khor dang sgrub pa dang phrin las kyang yod pa ma yin no //
translated: There is no seal, maṇḍala, practice, or activity.

original: rdo rje khu tshur la sogs pa btags pa'i phyag rgya yang yod pa ma yin /
analyzed: rdo rje khu tshur la sogs pa btags pa'i phyag rgya yang yod pa ma yin /
translated: There is no seal designated as the vajra fist, and so on.

original: me la mar ldugs pa'i sbyin sreg kyang /
analyzed: me la mar ldugs pa'i sbyin sreg kyang /
translated: There is no fire offering of pouring clarified butter.

original: ru ru sphu ru la sogs pa snying po dang phreng ba'i sngags btags par yod pa ma yin /🔽kha dog dang dbyibs su btags pa dang rtsig pa @259a * //
analyzed: ru ru sphu ru la sogs pa snying po dang phreng ba'i sngags btags par yod pa ma yin / kha dog dang dbyibs su btags pa dang rtsig pa @259a * //
translated: There is no essence mantra or rosary mantra designated as ru ru sphu ru, and so on.

original: la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor de yang yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor de yang yod pa ma yin no //
translated: There is no maṇḍala designated as color and shape, or as a wall, and so on.

original: de lta bu'i sgom pa'i nyams de yang rang bzhin med pa tsam du bya ba'i phyir phun sum tshogs pa'i gzhir ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: de lta bu'i sgom pa'i nyams de yang rang bzhin med pa tsam du bya ba'i phyir phun sum tshogs pa'i gzhir ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
translated: That meditation of such a kind is also not the basis for perfection, because it is merely the absence of intrinsic nature.

original: spros pa med pa'i rang bzhin las yang dag gnas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: spros pa med pa'i rang bzhin las yang dag gnas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
translated: In order to demonstrate that, it is said, “Abiding in the nature free from conceptual elaborations,” and so on.

original: de yang lta ba la sogs pa'i skabs su skyed byed ma sogs pa'i thabs thun mong ma yin pa'i yid so sor rtog pa'i bde ba nyams su blangs pas /
analyzed: de yang lta ba la sogs pa'i skabs su skyed byed ma sogs pa'i thabs thun mong ma yin pa'i yid so sor rtog pa'i bde ba nyams su blangs pas /
translated: Furthermore, in the context of the view and so forth, one experiences the bliss of the individual conceptual mind that is the uncommon method of the cause of generation and so forth.🔽

original: 'dir sgom pa'i nyams mchog tu bde ba chen po kho nar rang skye bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'dir sgom pa'i nyams mchog tu bde ba chen po kho nar rang skye bar 'gyur te /
translated: Furthermore, in the context of the view and so forth, the supreme experience of meditation arises by itself as only great bliss through the practice of the bliss of individual discernment of the mind, the uncommon method of the generation stage and so forth.

original: de yang mi rtog pa rang rnal du 'jug pas spros pa med pa'i shes pa'o //
analyzed: de yang mi rtog pa rang rnal du 'jug pas spros pa med pa'i shes pa'o //
translated: That is also nonconceptual consciousness free from conceptual elaborations because it is naturally settled in nonconceptuality.

original: rang bzhin las zhes pa ni bde ba chen po gnyug ma las so //
analyzed: rang bzhin las zhes pa ni bde ba chen po gnyug ma las so //
translated: “From the nature” means from the innate great bliss.

original: las zhes pa ni thams cad kyi 'byung khungs lnga par sbyar ba'am /
analyzed: las zhes pa ni thams cad kyi 'byung khungs lnga par sbyar ba'am /
translated: “From action” is connected to the fifth, the source of everything, or

original: yang na las zhes 'gar byed kyi lnga par sbyar te /
analyzed: yang na las zhes 'gar byed kyi lnga par sbyar te /
translated: alternatively, “action” is connected to the fifth case, the instrumental.

original: spros pa med pas thams cad bkag nas snang ba'i ye shes chen po nyid yang dag gnas zhes pa ni gnyis med 'od gsal ba'i bdag nyid do //
analyzed: spros pa med pas thams cad bkag nas snang ba'i ye shes chen po nyid yang dag gnas zhes pa ni gnyis med 'od gsal ba'i bdag nyid do //
translated: “Having stopped everything by being free from conceptual elaborations, the great wisdom of appearance is truly present” means it is the nature of nondual luminosity.

original: sngags dang lha ni nye bar mtshon pa'i 'bras bu ni /
analyzed: sngags dang lha ni nye bar mtshon pa'i 'bras bu ni /
translated: The result that is illustrated by the mantra and deity is

original: sngags ni de nyid yid can thams cad skyo bar byed pas na sngags so //
analyzed: sngags ni de nyid yid can thams cad skyo bar byed pas na sngags so //
translated: Mantra is so called because it protects the mind from all that is not reality.

original: snang ba thams cad rgyas 'debs par byed pas na phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: snang ba thams cad rgyas 'debs par byed pas na phyag rgya'o //
translated: Mudra is so called because it seals all appearances.

original: rnam par rtog pa thams cad sreg par byed pas sbyin sreg go //
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa thams cad sreg par byed pas sbyin sreg go //
translated: Homa is so called because it burns all conceptual thoughts.

original: kha dog sna tshogs par snang bas na rten gyi dkyil 'khor ro //
analyzed: kha dog sna tshogs par snang bas na rten gyi dkyil 'khor ro //
translated: The mandala of the support is so called because it appears as a variety of colors.

original: de nas phun sum tshogs pa'i bdag nyid gdod ma nas grub pa'i phyir lhan cig skyes pa'o /
analyzed: de nas phun sum tshogs pa'i bdag nyid gdod ma nas grub pa'i phyir lhan cig skyes pa'o /
translated: Then, because it is primordially established as the nature of perfection, it is innate.

original: da ni 'bras bu phun sum tshogs pa de bshad pa'i phyir rnam snang zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: da ni 'bras bu phun sum tshogs pa de bshad pa'i phyir rnam snang zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
translated: Now, in order to explain that perfection of result, [the Bhagavān] declares the appearance of Vairochana, etc.

original: de la yang bde ba'i ye shes de nyid 'od zer mthar thug pa med par khyab pas rnam snang ngo //
analyzed: de la yang bde ba'i ye shes de nyid 'od zer mthar thug pa med par khyab pas rnam snang ngo //
translated: There, that very exalted wisdom of bliss is Vairochana because it pervades without limit as light rays.

original: mi bskyod ces pa ni mi mthun pas so //
analyzed: mi bskyod ces pa ni mi mthun pas so //
translated: Akṣhobhya is so called because [he is] not adverse.

original: don yod grub ces pa ni sangs rgyas kun gyi las so //
analyzed: don yod grub ces pa ni sangs rgyas kun gyi las so //
translated: Amoghasiddhi is so called because [he is] the activity of all buddhas.

original: rin chen zhes pa ni rtog pa dkon pas so //
analyzed: rin chen zhes pa ni rtog pa dkon pas so //
translated: Ratna is so called because conceptualization is rare.

original: dpag med ces pa ni bde chen gyi che ba'o //
analyzed: dpag med ces pa ni bde chen gyi che ba'o //
translated: The word “immeasurable” refers to the greatness of great bliss.

original: sems dpa' zhes pa ni rdo rje sems dpa' ste /
analyzed: sems dpa' zhes pa ni rdo rje sems dpa' ste /
translated: The word “hero” refers to Vajrasattva,

original: mchog tu bde ba nyid do //
analyzed: mchog tu bde ba nyid do //
translated: who is the supreme bliss.

original: de dag ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lha yin na /
analyzed: de dag ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lha yin na /
translated: If these are supramundane deities,

original: 'jig rten pa'i 'bras bu phun sum tshogs pa med dam zhe na /
analyzed: 'jig rten pa'i 'bras bu phun sum tshogs pa med dam zhe na /
translated: then do they not have the perfection of mundane results?

original: de'i phyir tshangs pa la sogs pa bstan to //
analyzed: de'i phyir tshangs pa la sogs pa bstan to //
translated: Therefore, Brahmā and so on are taught.

original: de bshad pa yang tshig gsum gyis bstan te /
analyzed: de bshad pa yang tshig gsum gyis bstan te /
translated: That is explained by three lines.

original: yang bde @259b ba chen po de nyid mi rtog pa la khyab pa dang / bde ba dang gcig gsal bar bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: yang bde @259b ba chen po de nyid mi rtog pa la khyab pa dang / bde ba dang gcig gsal bar bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: Again, in order to demonstrate that very great bliss pervades nonconceptuality and is the same as bliss,

original: thams cad sangs rgyas de nyid brjod //
analyzed: thams cad sangs rgyas de nyid brjod //
translated: it is said, “All is said to be that buddha.”

original: ces pa'o // thams cad ces pa ni bshad pa'i skabs su /
analyzed: ces pa'o // thams cad ces pa ni bshad pa'i skabs su /
translated: “ All” is in the context of the explanation,

original: thams cad kun gyi bdag nyid gnas //🔽zhes pa ste /
analyzed: thams cad kun gyi bdag nyid gnas // zhes pa ste /
translated: “The nature of all abides.”

original: mi rtog pas khyab pa'o //
analyzed: mi rtog pas khyab pa'o //
translated: That is pervaded by nonconceptuality.

original: de nyid brjod ces pa ni bshad pa'i skabs su dam pa'i bde bas de nyid ces pa ste /
analyzed: de nyid brjod ces pa ni bshad pa'i skabs su dam pa'i bde bas de nyid ces pa ste /
translated: “ That” is in the context of the explanation, “That is said to be the bliss of the sublime.”

original: bde ba ro gcig tu bsdus pa'o //
analyzed: bde ba ro gcig tu bsdus pa'o //
translated: It is the same taste of bliss.

original: sangs rgyas zhes pa ni bshad pa'i skabs su /
analyzed: sangs rgyas zhes pa ni bshad pa'i skabs su /
translated: In the section on the explanation, it says:

original: bde ba rtogs pa'i phyir rnam sangs rgyas //🔽zhes pa ste /
analyzed: bde ba rtogs pa'i phyir rnam sangs rgyas // zhes pa ste /
translated: Because of realizing bliss, there is Buddhahood.

original: gnyis med rang rig 'od gsal ba'o //
analyzed: gnyis med rang rig 'od gsal ba'o //
translated: It is non-dual, self-aware luminosity.

original: 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i phun sum tshogs pa de la lhan cig ces ci'i phyir zhe na gang gi phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i phun sum tshogs pa de la lhan cig ces ci'i phyir zhe na gang gi phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
translated: Why is that excellence mundane and supramundane called together? It is said because of and so forth.

original: de yang ha ni lus so //
analyzed: de yang ha ni lus so //
translated: Moreover, ha is the body.

original: bha ga ni 'byung ba de ste de'i lus las 'byung bas lha'o //
analyzed: bha ga ni 'byung ba de ste de'i lus las 'byung bas lha'o //
translated: The bhaga is the element, and because it arises from that body, it is the deity.

original: de yang lhan cig skyes pa'i don yin te /
analyzed: de yang lhan cig skyes pa'i don yin te /
translated: That also has the meaning of co-emergent,

original: tshangs pa la sogs pa ni kun rdzob lhan cig skyes pas bsdus la rnam snang la sogs pa don dam lhan cig skyes pas bsdus pas tshigs su bcad pa gnyis kyi don no //
analyzed: tshangs pa la sogs pa ni kun rdzob lhan cig skyes pas bsdus la rnam snang la sogs pa don dam lhan cig skyes pas bsdus pas tshigs su bcad pa gnyis kyi don no //
translated: Brahma and so forth are included in the conventional co-emergence, while Vairochana and so forth are included in the ultimate co-emergence. This is the meaning of the two verses.

original: yang na phun sum tshogs pa'i bha ga w'a na ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: yang na phun sum tshogs pa'i bha ga w'a na ji lta bu zhe na /
translated: Alternatively, what kind of bhagawana is the excellence?

original: buddha 'di la zhes pa ste /
analyzed: buddha 'di la zhes pa ste /
translated: It is said buddha here.

original: gong gi 'od gsal ba'o //
analyzed: gong gi 'od gsal ba'o //
translated: It is the luminosity mentioned above.

original: bha ga w'a na zhes pa bha b'a na dzi ba ste rtog pa la sogs pa rang shugs kyis 'joms pa gang la yod pa de la bcom ldan 'das zhes bya'o //
analyzed: bha ga w'a na zhes pa bha b'a na dzi ba ste rtog pa la sogs pa rang shugs kyis 'joms pa gang la yod pa de la bcom ldan 'das zhes bya'o //
translated: Bha-ga-va-na is bha-va-jita, he who has conquered becoming, etc., and is so called because he has conquered the natural force of conceptual thought, etc.

original: yang na bha ga ni skal pa ste dbang phyug la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: yang na bha ga ni skal pa ste dbang phyug la sogs pa'o //
translated: Or else, bha-ga is good fortune, and va-na is lord.

original: des na tshigs su bcad pa phyed dang gnyis kyis bstan to //
analyzed: des na tshigs su bcad pa phyed dang gnyis kyis bstan to //
translated: Thus, it is taught in one and a half verses.

original: 'on te chos thams cad la lta ba shes rab dang thabs dbyer med du gtan la dbab pa dang / sgom pa'i nyams rang skyes pa'i de kho na nyid de lta bu yin na rten las kyi phyag rgya ma dang sring mo la sogs pa'i de kho na nyid ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: 'on te chos thams cad la lta ba shes rab dang thabs dbyer med du gtan la dbab pa dang / sgom pa'i nyams rang skyes pa'i de kho na nyid de lta bu yin na rten las kyi phyag rgya ma dang sring mo la sogs pa'i de kho na nyid ji lta bu zhe na /
translated: But if the view of all dharmas is the reality of the inseparability of wisdom and means, and the reality of the experience of meditation is self-arisen, then what is the reality of the consort, the karmamudra, the sister, etc.?

original: de rnams thabs dang shes rab dbyer med du shes par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: de rnams thabs dang shes rab dbyer med du shes par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: In order to understand that they are the inseparability of means and wisdom,

original: gang gi phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pas ston to //
analyzed: gang gi phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pas ston to //
translated: it is taught by because of that and so forth.

original: shes rab ces brjod par bya ba zhes pa ni shes rab kyi de kho na nyid stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: shes rab ces brjod par bya ba zhes pa ni shes rab kyi de kho na nyid stong pa nyid do //
translated: It is to be said wisdom is the reality of wisdom, emptiness.

original: gang phyir skye 'gro skyed pa zhes pa ni stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid kyi mtshan ma cir yang snang ba yang /
analyzed: gang phyir skye 'gro skyed pa zhes pa ni stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid kyi mtshan ma cir yang snang ba yang /
translated: Since it is the producer of living beings, it is the mother, emptiness, which appears as any sign at all.

original: mi 'gog par yum shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma'o //
analyzed: mi 'gog par yum shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma'o //
translated: It is the perfection of wisdom, the mother, because it does not block anything.

original: shes rab sring mo zhes bya nyid //
analyzed: shes rab sring mo zhes bya nyid //
translated: Wisdom is the sister.

original: ces bya ba ni /
analyzed: ces bya ba ni /
translated: This is the meaning.

original: bha ga w'a na ni ste skal pa dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: bha ga w'a na ni ste skal pa dang ldan pa'o //
translated: Bhaga is good fortune.

original: @260a * // de'i phyir gang phyir skal pa ston //🔽zhes pa ste /
analyzed: @260a * // de'i phyir gang phyir skal pa ston // zhes pa ste /
translated: Therefore, it is the teacher of good fortune.

original: skal pa ni thabs te shes rab stong pa nyid dang bcas pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: skal pa ni thabs te shes rab stong pa nyid dang bcas pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Good fortune is the method, because it is endowed with the wisdom of emptiness.

original: de bzhin du btso blag mo dang gar ma la yang thabs dang shes rab go rims bzhin no //
analyzed: de bzhin du btso blag mo dang gar ma la yang thabs dang shes rab go rims bzhin no //
translated: Similarly, the washerwoman and the dancer are the method and wisdom, respectively.

original: g-yung mo yang thabs su bstan pa ste /
analyzed: g-yung mo yang thabs su bstan pa ste /
translated: The prostitute is also taught to be the method.

original: de bzhin du gdol pa mo dang / bram ze mo la yang thabs su shes pa shugs kyis bstan no //
analyzed: de bzhin du gdol pa mo dang / bram ze mo la yang thabs su shes pa shugs kyis bstan no //
translated: Similarly, the candali and the brahmani are implicitly taught to be the method.

original: de dag ni lta ba dang sgom pa ste shes bya'i de kho na nyid do //
analyzed: de dag ni lta ba dang sgom pa ste shes bya'i de kho na nyid do //
translated: These are the views and meditations, the reality of the objects of knowledge.

original: sgo gsum nus pa can du byed pa sgrub pa po de kho na nyid ni /
analyzed: sgo gsum nus pa can du byed pa sgrub pa po de kho na nyid ni /
translated: The reality of the adept is the one who has the power of the three doors.

original: a'a li k'a li la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: a'a li k'a li la sogs pa'o //
translated: It is the Alikali, etc.🔽And that is stated:

original: de yang / a'a li k'a li rab brtags pas //
analyzed: de yang / a'a li k'a li rab brtags pas //
translated: By examining the Alikali,

original: zhes pa ni brjod pa ni thams cad rlung la rag las pa ste g-yon dang g-yas nas rgyu ba'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ni brjod pa ni thams cad rlung la rag las pa ste g-yon dang g-yas nas rgyu ba'o //
translated: the statement is that everything depends on the wind, moving from the left and right.

original: brjod pa thams cad bzlas par bshad //
analyzed: brjod pa thams cad bzlas par bshad //
translated: All statements are said to be repetition.

original: ces pa ni rlung las grub pa'am /
analyzed: ces pa ni rlung las grub pa'am /
translated: This is established from the wind,

original: yang na a'a li k'a li ste /🔽dbyangs dang gsal byed kyi yi ge las grub pa'i phyir bzlas pa yin te rdo rje'i bzlas pa rlung 'byung ba dang 'jug pa aam dang ham zlos pa'am /
analyzed: yang na a'a li k'a li ste / dbyangs dang gsal byed kyi yi ge las grub pa'i phyir bzlas pa yin te rdo rje'i bzlas pa rlung 'byung ba dang 'jug pa aam dang ham zlos pa'am /
translated: or else it is the Alikali,

original: yang na rang gi lhan cig skyes pa'i nyams kyis rnam dag snags kyi glu len ces bya'o //
analyzed: yang na rang gi lhan cig skyes pa'i nyams kyis rnam dag snags kyi glu len ces bya'o //
translated: because it is established from the vowels and consonants. It is repetition because it is the vajra repetition of the wind's exhalation and inhalation, or else it is the song of the natural expression of one's innate experience.

original: rkang pa'i rjes ni zhes pa ni rgya bris pa lta bur byung ba ste dkyil 'khor yin zhes pa ni gzugs brnyan du snang ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rkang pa'i rjes ni zhes pa ni rgya bris pa lta bur byung ba ste dkyil 'khor yin zhes pa ni gzugs brnyan du snang ba'i phyir ro //
translated: The footprint is like a seal impression, and the mandala is because it appears as a reflection.

original: des na / nyed phyir dkyil 'khor brjod par bya //
analyzed: des na / nyed phyir dkyil 'khor brjod par bya //
translated: the mandala is taught for the sake of union.

original: zhes pa'o // dkyil 'khor ni mandalabris pa na dkyil 'khor ro //
analyzed: zhes pa'o // dkyil 'khor ni mandalabris pa na dkyil 'khor ro //
translated: The mandala is the mandala drawn in the maṇḍala.🔽It is the same as the word “union” because it is united or drawn.

original: ma ta na nyed pas sam bris pas zhes sgra mthun pa dang / yang ye shes de nyid rten dang brten par snang ste brtag pa phyi mar 'chad do //
analyzed: ma ta na nyed pas sam bris pas zhes sgra mthun pa dang / yang ye shes de nyid rten dang brten par snang ste brtag pa phyi mar 'chad do //
translated: Moreover, that very gnosis appears as the support and the supported, as will be explained in the next chapter.

original: lag pa bsgyur ba zhes pa ni gar la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: lag pa bsgyur ba zhes pa ni gar la sogs pa'o //
translated: “ Hand gestures” are dancing and so forth.

original: phyag rgya yin zhes pa ni bde ba'i rtags yin pas so //
analyzed: phyag rgya yin zhes pa ni bde ba'i rtags yin pas so //
translated: “ Mudrā” is a sign of bliss.

original: sor mo nyed pa'ang de bzhin no //
analyzed: sor mo nyed pa'ang de bzhin no //
translated: “ Fingers united” is also like that.

original: zhes pa ni de kho na nyid kyi mtshan ma dang rtags so //
analyzed: zhes pa ni de kho na nyid kyi mtshan ma dang rtags so //
translated: This is the sign and the mark of reality.

original: gang sems dpa' bsam gtan du bstan pa yang tshig gnyis te /
analyzed: gang sems dpa' bsam gtan du bstan pa yang tshig gnyis te /
translated: The two lines that teach the bodhicitta as meditation🔽are the reason.

original: de'i rgyu mtshan yang ji ltar zhes pa tshigs su bcad pa gcig gis so //
analyzed: de'i rgyu mtshan yang ji ltar zhes pa tshigs su bcad pa gcig gis so //
translated: How is that? One verse.

original: ji ltar pha las bde thob pa //
analyzed: ji ltar pha las bde thob pa //
translated: Just as one obtains bliss from the father,

original: zhes pa ni slob dpon la la dag bla ma dang rdo rje 'dzin pa la 'dod do //
analyzed: zhes pa ni slob dpon la la dag bla ma dang rdo rje 'dzin pa la 'dod do //
translated: some masters assert that the guru is the vajra holder.

original: de ni 'dir mthun pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de ni 'dir mthun pa ma yin no //
translated: That is not appropriate here.

original: dper na pha las thob pa ni rang gi nor te /
analyzed: dper na pha las thob pa ni rang gi nor te /
translated: For example, what is obtained from the father is one's own wealth.

original: gzhan lhag ma mi tshol ba'i don no //
analyzed: gzhan lhag ma mi tshol ba'i don no //
translated: The meaning is that one does not seek anything else.

original: de yi bde ba rang gis bza' //
analyzed: de yi bde ba rang gis bza' //
translated: One's bliss is to be enjoyed by oneself.

original: zhes pa ni bo ki ni bza' ba'am longs spyod @260b pa'o ;
analyzed: zhes pa ni bo ki ni bza' ba'am longs spyod @260b pa'o ;
translated: Bhogini means enjoyment or experience.

original: / des na lhan cig skyes pa la longs spyod pas /🔽de yi bde ba bsam gtan brjod //
analyzed: / des na lhan cig skyes pa la longs spyod pas / de yi bde ba bsam gtan brjod //
translated: Therefore, by enjoying the connate,

original: ces pa'o // bde ba gang phyir 'chi ba 'dir //
analyzed: ces pa'o // bde ba gang phyir 'chi ba 'dir //
translated: one's bliss is called concentration.

original: zhes pa ni slob dpon la la dag 'chi ba'i chos su 'dod pa dang / la la dag spyod lam du 'dod de /
analyzed: zhes pa ni slob dpon la la dag 'chi ba'i chos su 'dod pa dang / la la dag spyod lam du 'dod de /
translated: Some masters assert that death is a Dharma, and some assert that it is a posture.

original: de dag 'dir mthun pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de dag 'dir mthun pa ma yin no //
translated: Those are not appropriate here.

original: ji lta bu zhe na ;
analyzed: ji lta bu zhe na ;
translated: What is it like?

original: / de yang 'chi ba ni sdug bsngal gyi gtso bo ste /
analyzed: / de yang 'chi ba ni sdug bsngal gyi gtso bo ste /
translated: Death is the principal suffering.

original: de bsam gtan du ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: de bsam gtan du ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
translated: How can that be concentration?

original: bden te 'on kyang bza' ba longs spyod kyi skabs su rang gi bden pa las lhag par mi tshol zhing /
analyzed: bden te 'on kyang bza' ba longs spyod kyi skabs su rang gi bden pa las lhag par mi tshol zhing /
translated: It is true, but in the section on enjoying food, one does not seek anything other than one's own bliss.

original: 'chi ba'i tshe yang rang gi bde ba dang mi 'bral ba ste lhan cig skyes pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'chi ba'i tshe yang rang gi bde ba dang mi 'bral ba ste lhan cig skyes pa'i phyir ro //
translated: At the time of death, too, one is not separated from one's bliss, because it is connate.

original: des na rgyun du rtsa gcig pas gang bsam kyang bsam gtan kho na'o //
analyzed: des na rgyun du rtsa gcig pas gang bsam kyang bsam gtan kho na'o //
translated: Therefore, since one is always filled with a single nāḍī, whatever one imagines is meditative concentration.

original: spyir sngags kyi lugs kyis tshe 'di la 'bras bu thob pa dang / bar do la 'bras bu thob pa'o //
analyzed: spyir sngags kyi lugs kyis tshe 'di la 'bras bu thob pa dang / bar do la 'bras bu thob pa'o //
translated: In general, in the mantra system, there are two ways to attain the result: attaining the result in this life and attaining the result in the intermediate state.

original: tshe 'di la thob pa la gnyis /
analyzed: tshe 'di la thob pa la gnyis /
translated: Attaining the result in this life is twofold:

original: rnam smin 'bor ba dang / mi 'bor ba'o //🔽de la bskyed rim gtsor bsgoms pas /
analyzed: rnam smin 'bor ba dang / mi 'bor ba'o // de la bskyed rim gtsor bsgoms pas /
translated: discarding the fruitions of karma and not discarding them.🔽Discarding the fruitions of karma is as follows:

original: mkha' spyod bsgrubs la de nas phyag rgya chen po bsgrub pa ste /🔽buddha'o // rdzogs rim pa ni lus 'ja' tshon ltar ba sgyur /
analyzed: mkha' spyod bsgrubs la de nas phyag rgya chen po bsgrub pa ste / buddha'o // rdzogs rim pa ni lus 'ja' tshon ltar ba sgyur /
translated: Having accomplished the celestial realm through primarily meditating on the creation stage, then mahāmudrā is accomplished.

original: sems phyag rgya chen por 'gyur te thal byung du sangs rgyas so //
analyzed: sems phyag rgya chen por 'gyur te thal byung du sangs rgyas so //
translated: The completion stage practitioner transforms the body into a rainbow body and the mind into mahāmudrā and becomes a buddha in a natural way.

original: rnam smin 'dor ba ni lus lhar gsal tsam las med kyang sems phyag rgya chen por sbyor te spyod pas mthar phyin nas 'chi ba'i spyod lam du shes pas 'gro zhing 'tshang rgya'o //
analyzed: rnam smin 'dor ba ni lus lhar gsal tsam las med kyang sems phyag rgya chen por sbyor te spyod pas mthar phyin nas 'chi ba'i spyod lam du shes pas 'gro zhing 'tshang rgya'o //
translated: Although one has only the mere clarity of the body as the deity, one applies the mind to the great seal, and having perfected that, one goes to the place of death and becomes enlightened.

original: de ltar ma nus na bar do'i gdams ngag gis 'tshangs rgya ba ste /
analyzed: de ltar ma nus na bar do'i gdams ngag gis 'tshangs rgya ba ste /
translated: If one is not able to do that, one becomes enlightened by the instructions on the intermediate state.

original: de rtsa ba'i rgyud ltar bya ba dang / bshad pa'i rgyud s'a mu ta ltar gong du 'pho ba dang grong du 'pho ba dang grong du 'jug pa la sogs pa'i gzhan dang bla ma'i zhal las shes par bya'o //
analyzed: de rtsa ba'i rgyud ltar bya ba dang / bshad pa'i rgyud s'a mu ta ltar gong du 'pho ba dang grong du 'pho ba dang grong du 'jug pa la sogs pa'i gzhan dang bla ma'i zhal las shes par bya'o //
translated: One should learn those from the root tantra, the Samvarodaya Tantra, and the explanatory tantra, the Samvarodaya Tantra, and from the guru's instructions.

original: de ltar ma nus na smon lam btab la skye ba gzhan la 'khor los sgyur ba la sogs par skye ste skye ba bdun tshun chad kyis 'grub lces bya'o //
analyzed: de ltar ma nus na smon lam btab la skye ba gzhan la 'khor los sgyur ba la sogs par skye ste skye ba bdun tshun chad kyis 'grub lces bya'o //
translated: If one is not able to do that, one should make aspirations and be born in another life as a cakravartin and so on.

original: le'u ni snga ma bzhin te yang bgrangs pa'i lnga pa'o /
analyzed: le'u ni snga ma bzhin te yang bgrangs pa'i lnga pa'o /
translated: The chapter is the same as before, the fifth of the numbered chapters.

original: // / de nas yang dag bshad par bya //
analyzed: // / de nas yang dag bshad par bya //
translated: Now, I will explain

original: zhes pa ni lta ba dang sgom pa'i rjes su 'bras bu spyod pas mthar phyin pa bshad pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ni lta ba dang sgom pa'i rjes su 'bras bu spyod pas mthar phyin pa bshad pa'o //
translated: This explains that the result of the view and meditation is perfected by the conduct.

original: de yang spyod pa ni tsarya ste tsarya ni rgyu ba'o //
analyzed: de yang spyod pa ni tsarya ste tsarya ni rgyu ba'o //
translated: Moreover, conduct is carya, and carya means to move.

original: ya yo gi ni rnal 'bor mar sbyor ba'o //
analyzed: ya yo gi ni rnal 'bor mar sbyor ba'o //
translated: Yoga means to apply oneself to the yoginis.

original: des cir 'gyur zhe na /🔽gnas dag tu rgyu zhing sbyor ba'am //
analyzed: des cir 'gyur zhe na / gnas dag tu rgyu zhing sbyor ba'am //
translated: What is the result of that?🔽One moves in pure places and applies oneself,

original: rnal 'byor gyi rnam par rgyu ba'o //
analyzed: rnal 'byor gyi rnam par rgyu ba'o //
translated: or one moves in the aspect of yoga.

original: spyod pa 'di yang bskyed pa'i rim pas brtag pa phyi mar ston la //
analyzed: spyod pa 'di yang bskyed pa'i rim pas brtag pa phyi mar ston la //
translated: This conduct is taught in the later examination by means of the creation stage.

original: @261a * // 'di rdzogs pa'i rim pa ste de yang gzhan lus shes rab la brten pa gsang ba'i spyod pa dang / rang lus thabs la brten pa cung zad smyon pa brtul zhugs kyi spyod pa dang / phyag rgya chen po la brten pa smyon pa'i brtul zhugs mchog tu gsang ba'i spyod pa'o //
analyzed: @261a * // 'di rdzogs pa'i rim pa ste de yang gzhan lus shes rab la brten pa gsang ba'i spyod pa dang / rang lus thabs la brten pa cung zad smyon pa brtul zhugs kyi spyod pa dang / phyag rgya chen po la brten pa smyon pa'i brtul zhugs mchog tu gsang ba'i spyod pa'o //
translated: This is the completion stage, which is also the secret conduct that is based on the wisdom of another’s body, the slightly crazy conduct of the observances that is based on one’s own body, and the extremely secret conduct of the supreme crazy observances that is based on the great seal.

original: de dag gi dgos pa ni spyod mchog pha rol phyin pa ste /
analyzed: de dag gi dgos pa ni spyod mchog pha rol phyin pa ste /
translated: The purpose of those is the perfection of supreme conduct.

original: pha rol tu phyin pa'i thun mong ngo //
analyzed: pha rol tu phyin pa'i thun mong ngo //
translated: That is common to the perfections.

original: mchog ni thun mong ma yin pa ste /
analyzed: mchog ni thun mong ma yin pa ste /
translated: The supreme is the uncommon.

original: des na dngos grub mthar 'gro ba ste /
analyzed: des na dngos grub mthar 'gro ba ste /
translated: Therefore, it is the culmination of power.

original: pha rol tu phyin pa las grub mtha' ste /
analyzed: pha rol tu phyin pa las grub mtha' ste /
translated: It is the conclusion of the perfection stage,

original: snang ba stong pa dbyer med par rtogs pa'o //
analyzed: snang ba stong pa dbyer med par rtogs pa'o //

original: dgyes pa'i rdo rje'i dngos grub kyi rgyur ro //
analyzed: dgyes pa'i rdo rje'i dngos grub kyi rgyur ro //

analyzed: grub pa'i mthur 'gro ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang bskyed pa'i rim pa las so zhes thun mong ma yin zhe na /
translated: If it is argued that the perfection stage and the generation stage are the cause of the power of the perfection stage and the generation stage, respectively, and that the perfection stage and the generation stage are not common to both,

original: dgyes pa'i rdo rje'i dngos grub kyi rgyus te /
analyzed: dgyes pa'i rdo rje'i dngos grub kyi rgyus te /
translated: it is replied that the perfection stage and the generation stage are the cause of the power of Hevajra.

original: mchog gi dngos grub mthar thug pa thob pa'o //
analyzed: mchog gi dngos grub mthar thug pa thob pa'o //
translated: The culmination of the supreme power is attained.

original: de ni gsang ba la sogs pa'i thun mong ngo //
analyzed: de ni gsang ba la sogs pa'i thun mong ngo //

original: sgom pa po la sogs pa tshigs bcad gnyis dang / tshig rkang pa gcig gis gsang ba'i spyod pa'i cha lugs tsam ste /
analyzed: sgom pa po la sogs pa tshigs bcad gnyis dang / tshig rkang pa gcig gis gsang ba'i spyod pa'i cha lugs tsam ste /

original: rus pa'i rgyan cha rnams kyis bzang ba'o //
analyzed: rus pa'i rgyan cha rnams kyis bzang ba'o //

original: de'i dgos pa dang rnam par dag pa ni go sla'o //
analyzed: de'i dgos pa dang rnam par dag pa ni go sla'o //
translated: The purpose and purity of that are easy to understand.

original: he ru ka sbyor skyes bu nyid ni rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i nyams kyis spyod pa byed kyang bskyed pa'i rim pa nyung ldan gyi nga rgyal gyis gnas pa ste /
analyzed: he ru ka sbyor skyes bu nyid ni rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i nyams kyis spyod pa byed kyang bskyed pa'i rim pa nyung ldan gyi nga rgyal gyis gnas pa ste /
translated: The hero born of the union with Heruka, even though he practices with the experience of the perfection stage, abides with the pride of the creation stage with its few [deities].

original: de'i yon tan ni rigs lnga dag gi la sogs pa ste go sla'o //
analyzed: de'i yon tan ni rigs lnga dag gi la sogs pa ste go sla'o //

original: de yang gsang ba'i spyod pa'i thun mong ma yin pa'i gnas ni shing gcig la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: de yang gsang ba'i spyod pa'i thun mong ma yin pa'i gnas ni shing gcig la sogs pa ste /
translated: The uncommon places for the secret conduct are the single tree, etc.

original: shing gcig ni shing gzhan gyi grib mas ma phog pa'o //
analyzed: shing gcig ni shing gzhan gyi grib mas ma phog pa'o //
translated: The single tree is not shaded by other trees.

original: dur khrod ni ro mang po gnas pa'o //
analyzed: dur khrod ni ro mang po gnas pa'o //

original: ma mo'i khyim ni 'jig rten na grags pa ma mo bdun gyi gnas so //
analyzed: ma mo'i khyim ni 'jig rten na grags pa ma mo bdun gyi gnas so //

original: mtshan mo ni dus mtshan ma rgyu ba'i gnas so //
analyzed: mtshan mo ni dus mtshan ma rgyu ba'i gnas so //
translated: The night is the place of the wandering of the midnight [demons].

original: dpen pa ni skye bo nyung ba'o //
analyzed: dpen pa ni skye bo nyung ba'o //
translated: The solitary place is where few people are.

original: bas mtha' ni dgon pa'i tshad de /
analyzed: bas mtha' ni dgon pa'i tshad de /
translated: The border region is the measure of the wilderness.

original: rgyang grangs gcig gam mtsho'i klong ngam sgrib g-yogs kyis chod pa'o //
analyzed: rgyang grangs gcig gam mtsho'i klong ngam sgrib g-yogs kyis chod pa'o //
translated: It is one league, or it is an island or a place hidden by a screen.

original: de ni phye ste bskyed pa'i rim pa dang thun mong ngo //
analyzed: de ni phye ste bskyed pa'i rim pa dang thun mong ngo //
translated: That is the common [practice] of the creation stage.

translated: Here, if it is taught that the place and conduct are based on the creation stage, then it is related to the consort, the channels and winds, and the completion stage.

analyzed: de bden te sngar ni ma smin pa'i dbang du byas la de yang gang gis dngos grub mthar 'gro ba nas tshig @261b rkang gsum brjod pa dang / he ru ka kha sbyor nas / kha dog lnga la rnam par gnas // zhes zer bas so //
translated: That is true, but previously it was from the perspective of the unripened.🔽Here, for example, it is like a mango fruit.

analyzed: 'dir ni dper na aa mra'i 'bras dang 'dra sde phyi nang gnyi ga ma smin pa'i dzo gi la thabs gtsor byas te /

original: las kyi phyag rgya la brten pa dang / phyi smin cing nang ma smin pa'i dzo gi thabs shes rab zung 'brel gyi sgo nas rtsa rlung la brten pa dang phyi nang gnyis ka smin pa'i rnal 'byor pa la shes rab gtsor byas te /
analyzed: las kyi phyag rgya la brten pa dang / phyi smin cing nang ma smin pa'i dzo gi thabs shes rab zung 'brel gyi sgo nas rtsa rlung la brten pa dang phyi nang gnyis ka smin pa'i rnal 'byor pa la shes rab gtsor byas te /
translated: For the yogi who is ripened externally and internally, wisdom is emphasized.

original: nam mkha' lam khyer te man ngag la brten pa'o //
analyzed: nam mkha' lam khyer te man ngag la brten pa'o //
translated: The space is integrated on the path, based on the intimate instructions.

original: de yang 'og nas /
analyzed: de yang 'og nas /
translated: Moreover, it is said below:

original: chos 'byung las skyes ye shes ni //
analyzed: chos 'byung las skyes ye shes ni //

original: mkha' mnyam lhan cig thabs dang bcas ;
analyzed: mkha' mnyam lhan cig thabs dang bcas ;

original: / zhes pa dang / gang phyir yid kyis mi bsgom par //
analyzed: / zhes pa dang / gang phyir yid kyis mi bsgom par //
translated: Since it is not meditated by the mind,

original: 'gro ba thams cad bsgom par bya //
analyzed: 'gro ba thams cad bsgom par bya //
translated: all migrating beings are meditated.

original: zhes dang / gzhan gyis brjod med lhan cig skyes //
analyzed: zhes dang / gzhan gyis brjod med lhan cig skyes //
translated: The connate [union] is inexpressible by others.

original: zhes pa nas bla ma'i dus thabs zhes pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa nas bla ma'i dus thabs zhes pa'o //
translated: The time of the guru is the method.

original: de nas 'brel ba yod pa'o //
analyzed: de nas 'brel ba yod pa'o //
translated: Then, there is the connection.

original: gzhan lus shes rab la brten pa las kyi phyag rgya'i khyad par la bya ste /
analyzed: gzhan lus shes rab la brten pa las kyi phyag rgya'i khyad par la bya ste /

original: shing gcig ni gtum mo'o //
analyzed: shing gcig ni gtum mo'o //
translated: The tree is candali.

original: dur khrod ni g-yung mo'o //
analyzed: dur khrod ni g-yung mo'o //
translated: The charnel ground is yogini.

original: ma mo'i khyim ni gar ma'o //
analyzed: ma mo'i khyim ni gar ma'o //
translated: The house of the mother is laya.

original: mtshan mo ni tshos ma'o //
analyzed: mtshan mo ni tshos ma'o //
translated: The night is rasan.

original: dben pa dang bas mtha' ni bram ze ma'o //
analyzed: dben pa dang bas mtha' ni bram ze ma'o //

original: de dag ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de dag ci'i phyir zhe na /

translated: It is a hero in destroying discursive thought, it is foul and unfit to be touched, it is in the many, it is in the conduct, it is in the transformation of the ordinary, and it is free from the faults of defilement and discursive thought.

analyzed: rang lus thabs la brten pa ni shing gcig ni aa wa dh'u t'i'o //

original: dur khrod ni bya rog gi gdong can no //
analyzed: dur khrod ni bya rog gi gdong can no //

original: ma mo'i khyim ni rtsa gzhan dag go //

original: dus mtshan ma ni 'khor lo gsum mo //
analyzed: dus mtshan ma ni 'khor lo gsum mo //

analyzed: dben pa'am bas mtha' ni bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo'o //

original: de dag ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de dag ci'i phyir zhe na /

translated: It is the place of origin and dissolution of those, and it is free from the movement of self-excitement, and the arising of the spirit of enlightenment in those places, and the resting, setting, and attachment in those three places, and it is free from the faults of attachment and non-attachment.

original: gnyis su med pa phyag rgya chen po ni /
analyzed: gnyis su med pa phyag rgya chen po ni /

original: dur khrod ni lus so //
analyzed: dur khrod ni lus so //

analyzed: @262a * // de dag ci'i phyir zhe na /

original: / des ye shes rang 'bar ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: / des ye shes rang 'bar ba'i phyir ro //

analyzed: bsgom pa bzang bar brjod par bya //

analyzed: zhes pa ni de lta bu dag gis ni lhan cig skyes pa'i gdon mi za bar skye ba'i phyir ro //

analyzed: 'di rnams kyi cho ga kha bskang ba ni snga ma dang 'dra'o //

analyzed: cung zad drod ni thob pa na //

analyzed: zhes pa ste /

analyzed: de yang phyag rgya chen po'i man ngag nyams su len pas ni /

analyzed: dbang po rab snang gi drod man ngag gi cung zad smyon pa'i drod do //

original: de dag ni nus pa'i tshad kyi dus yin la /
analyzed: de dag ni nus pa'i tshad kyi dus yin la /

analyzed: da ni rgyu mtshan gyi dus bstan pa'i phyir gang tshe spyod pa byed 'dod na //

original: zhes pa ste /
analyzed: zhes pa ste /
translated: and so on.

analyzed: gzhan gyi don du'o //

analyzed: gang tshe 'grub 'gyur 'dod yod na //
