original: zhes pa ni rang gi don du'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ni rang gi don du'o //

analyzed: 'dis ni spyod pa spyad pa nyid //

analyzed: ces pa ni de gsum gyi tshe spyod pa bya ba kho na'o //
translated: means that at the time of those three, one should only perform the conduct.

original: de ni gsang ba la sogs pa'i thun mong ngo //
analyzed: de ni gsang ba la sogs pa'i thun mong ngo //
translated: That is the common [practice] of secrecy, and so on.

original: shin tu bzhin bzangs la sogs pa tshigs su bcad pa gnyis kyis ni grogs bstan to //
analyzed: shin tu bzhin bzangs la sogs pa tshigs su bcad pa gnyis kyis ni grogs bstan to //

original: gsang ba'i spyod pa thun mong ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: gsang ba'i spyod pa thun mong ma yin pa'o //

original: shing gcig pa la sogs pa yang grogs bstan pa dang mi 'gal lam zhe na /
analyzed: shing gcig pa la sogs pa yang grogs bstan pa dang mi 'gal lam zhe na /
translated: If it is asked, “Is it not contradictory to teach the companion of the solitary tree, and so on?”

original: ma yin te dang ni bshad pa'i tshul sbyar ba yin la /
analyzed: ma yin te dang ni bshad pa'i tshul sbyar ba yin la /
translated: It is not contradictory because the term “and” is used in the method of explanation.

original: 'dir ni dngos su bstan pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'dir ni dngos su bstan pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Here, it is because it is directly taught.

analyzed: gang tshe dga' ba la sogs pa ni glu dang gar la sogs pa ni spyod pa'i ngo bos bstan te go sla'o //
translated: When the “joy” and so on are taught by the nature of the conduct of song, dance, and so on, it is easy to understand.

analyzed: de la phyag rgya'i rnam dag dang bza' btung gi yon tan ni rang dang 'brel par shes par bya'o //

analyzed: da ni cung zad smyon pa'i brtul zhugs kyi spyod pa bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: Now, in order to teach the conduct of the slightly insane,

original: rkun ma'i zhes bya ba la @262b sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: rkun ma'i zhes bya ba la @262b sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: it is said, “the thief,” and so on.

original: 'di'i cha byad gzhan ni /
analyzed: 'di'i cha byad gzhan ni /
translated: The other costume of this [conduct] is

analyzed: smad g-yogs kha dog sna tshogs dang // zhes pa la sogs pa bstan pa phyi mar bstan /
translated: This is taught in the later chapter.

analyzed: 'di ni tshigs su bcad pa phyed dang gsum gyis cha byad bstan te go sla'o //

original: rang lus thabs dang ldan pa des glu dang gar gyi snyoms par 'jug pa des spyod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: rang lus thabs dang ldan pa des glu dang gar gyi snyoms par 'jug pa des spyod pa ma yin te /
translated: One should not practice with the union of song and dance of one’s own body and method.🔽Therefore,

original: des na / cang te'u'i sgra ni blangs pa ste //
analyzed: des na / cang te'u'i sgra ni blangs pa ste //

analyzed: zhes pa ni glu dang 'dra ba'i spyod pa'o // kha tv'am ga sgom shes rab ni gar dang 'dra'o //

analyzed: rdo rje spyod pa yis zhes pa ni snyoms par 'jug pa lta bu'o //
translated: The vajra practice is like union.

analyzed: 'di dag bzlas pa dang sgom pa yin zhes pa ni che ba'i bdag nyid de /
translated: These are the recitation and meditation, which is the greatness of the self.

original: ba blas sgom dang ldan pa'i snyoms 'jug gi spyod pa'o //
analyzed: ba blas sgom dang ldan pa'i snyoms 'jug gi spyod pa'o //
translated: The practice of union endowed with meditation is the practice of the yogi.

original: brkam dang rmongs la sogs pa'i tshigs bcad gcig gis ni bsam pa'i khyad par te go sla'o //
analyzed: brkam dang rmongs la sogs pa'i tshigs bcad gcig gis ni bsam pa'i khyad par te go sla'o //
translated: The verse on greed, delusion, and so on is the special thought, which is easy to understand.

original: spyir spyod pa ma byas pas sangs mi rgya 'am zhe na /
analyzed: spyir spyod pa ma byas pas sangs mi rgya 'am zhe na /
translated: Generally speaking, one might ask, “Is it not the case that one does not become enlightened without engaging in conduct?”

original: mi rgya ste spyod pa byed pa kho na ste /
analyzed: mi rgya ste spyod pa byed pa kho na ste /
translated: It is not the case that one does not become enlightened, for one does become enlightened by engaging in conduct.

original: dper na mi 'ga' zhig sbal pas 'jigs la /
analyzed: dper na mi 'ga' zhig sbal pas 'jigs la /
translated: To draw an analogy, suppose there were a man who was afraid of snakes.

original: 'di la ci'i phyir 'jigs gnod pa'i rtsal yang med na /
analyzed: 'di la ci'i phyir 'jigs gnod pa'i rtsal yang med na /
translated: Someone might say to him, “Why be afraid? It has no power to harm you.

original: 'gugs pa'i mchu yang med /
analyzed: 'gugs pa'i mchu yang med /
translated: It has no fangs with which to bite you,🔽nor does it have a mouth with which to inject you with venom.”

original: gcod pa'i so yang med pa'i phyir 'jigs par mi bya'o zhes brjod kyang da dung bag tsha ba dang ldan te /
analyzed: gcod pa'i so yang med pa'i phyir 'jigs par mi bya'o zhes brjod kyang da dung bag tsha ba dang ldan te /
translated: But even so, he would still be apprehensive.

original: des reg pa dang gnod pa'i sbyor ba byed pas //
analyzed: des reg pa dang gnod pa'i sbyor ba byed pas //
translated: Because he has been bitten by a snake and has had the experience of being poisoned,

original: des snga ma'i don de khong du chud nas 'jigs pa med pa thob po ;
analyzed: des snga ma'i don de khong du chud nas 'jigs pa med pa thob po ;
translated: he would understand the meaning of what was said to him and would then overcome his fear.

original: / de bzhin du dngos po la mngon par zhen pa lta bas rang bzhin med par rtogs /
analyzed: / de bzhin du dngos po la mngon par zhen pa lta bas rang bzhin med par rtogs /
translated: In the same way, one might have a conviction about the nature of things based on one’s view, realizing that they have no independent nature of their own.

original: sgom pas kyang de ltar bsgoms kyang dngos po la mngon par zhen pa da dung skye bas /
analyzed: sgom pas kyang de ltar bsgoms kyang dngos po la mngon par zhen pa da dung skye bas /
translated: And one might also meditate on that, but still one might have a conviction about the nature of things that is based on one’s meditation.

original: spyod pa bya dgos te gtsang ba dang mi gtsang ba dang / sdug pa dang mi sdug pa dang / zhe sdang ba dang mi sdang ba dang / bstod pa dang smad pa la sogs pa dngos po la mngon par zhen pa skye bas ro mnyam pa'i spyod pa bya dgos so //
analyzed: spyod pa bya dgos te gtsang ba dang mi gtsang ba dang / sdug pa dang mi sdug pa dang / zhe sdang ba dang mi sdang ba dang / bstod pa dang smad pa la sogs pa dngos po la mngon par zhen pa skye bas ro mnyam pa'i spyod pa bya dgos so //
translated: One must engage in conduct, because the arising of attachment to things such as purity and impurity, beauty and ugliness, aversion and non-aversion, praise and blame, and so forth, must be equalized.

original: yang spyod pa 'di gsum mthar chags su bya dgos sam mi dgos zhe na /🔽la la dag la ni mthar chags su yang bya /
analyzed: yang spyod pa 'di gsum mthar chags su bya dgos sam mi dgos zhe na / la la dag la ni mthar chags su yang bya /
translated: Moreover, must these three conducts be performed in sequence or not?🔽For some, they are performed in sequence.

original: la la dag ni thod rgal du yang spyod de /
analyzed: la la dag ni thod rgal du yang spyod de /
translated: For others, they are performed in a random order.

original: spyod pa spyod pa lam du bya /
analyzed: spyod pa spyod pa lam du bya /
translated: Conduct is applied to the path.

original: spyod lam dbang po rang snang phyag rgya chen por sbyar la /
analyzed: spyod lam dbang po rang snang phyag rgya chen por sbyar la /
translated: The conduct of the four modes of conduct is applied to the great seal of the natural manifestation of the sense organs.

original: de nas rtags gsum po las bar ba la byed pa yang srid tha ma la byed pa yang srid do //
analyzed: de nas rtags gsum po las bar ba la byed pa yang srid tha ma la byed pa yang srid do //
translated: Then, the three signs are applied to the intermediate state, and it is also possible that they are applied to the final life.

original: bshad pa'i rgyud nas ni spyod pa bzhi ru brtags te /
analyzed: bshad pa'i rgyud nas ni spyod pa bzhi ru brtags te /
translated: In the explanatory tantras, the four conducts are classified.

original: rgyal tshab kyi spyod pa dang / rigs pa brtul zhugs kyi spyod pa dang / phyogs las @263a * //
analyzed: rgyal tshab kyi spyod pa dang / rigs pa brtul zhugs kyi spyod pa dang / phyogs las @263a * //
translated: the conduct of the regent,🔽the conduct of reasoning and discipline,🔽and the conduct of the directions.

original: rnam par rgyal ba'i spyod pa dang / aa wa dh'u t'i'i spyod pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par rgyal ba'i spyod pa dang / aa wa dh'u t'i'i spyod pa'o //
translated: the conduct of the regent, the conduct of the yogic discipline of reasoning, the conduct of victory in all ways, and the conduct of the central channel.

original: de dag dang 'di dag ci rigs su bsdu /
analyzed: de dag dang 'di dag ci rigs su bsdu /
translated: These and those are included as appropriate.

original: phan tshun dgongs pa shes par bya'o //
analyzed: phan tshun dgongs pa shes par bya'o //
translated: Their intentions should be understood in mutual relation.

original: da ni smyon pa'i brtul zhugs kyi spyod pa bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa gsum gsungs te /
analyzed: da ni smyon pa'i brtul zhugs kyi spyod pa bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa gsum gsungs te /
translated: Now, in order to teach the conduct of the yogic discipline of the insane, three verses are stated.

original: 'di rnam pa gzhan bstan pa'i phyir ;
analyzed: 'di rnam pa gzhan bstan pa'i phyir ;
translated: In order to teach that in another way,

original: brtag pa phyi ma las bza' btung ji ltar rnyed pa ltar bza' zhes pa la sogs pa bstan to //
analyzed: brtag pa phyi ma las bza' btung ji ltar rnyed pa ltar bza' zhes pa la sogs pa bstan to //
translated: in the Later Tantra, it is taught that one should eat whatever food and drink one finds, and so forth.

original: lus kyi sbyin pa byin nas ni //
analyzed: lus kyi sbyin pa byin nas ni //
translated: Having given the gift of one's body,

original: zhes pa ni lus dang srog la mi lta'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ni lus dang srog la mi lta'o //
translated: one should not care for one's body or life.

original: phyi nas spyod pa yang dag spyad //
analyzed: phyi nas spyod pa yang dag spyad //
translated: Later, one should practice the conduct.

original: ces pa ni de lta bu dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: ces pa ni de lta bu dang ldan pa'o //
translated: One who possesses that should practice the conduct.

original: lus kyi sbyin pa ji lta bu zhe na /🔽de bstan pa'i phyir skal dang skal med rnam dpyad nas //
analyzed: lus kyi sbyin pa ji lta bu zhe na / de bstan pa'i phyir skal dang skal med rnam dpyad nas //
translated: What is the gift of one's body?🔽In order to teach that, it is stated:

original: zhes pa ste /
analyzed: zhes pa ste /
translated: Having analyzed who is worthy and unworthy...

original: sbyin pa'i gnas yin pa dang ma yin pa spyad nas sbyin pa byed pa dang mi byed par ro //
analyzed: sbyin pa'i gnas yin pa dang ma yin pa spyad nas sbyin pa byed pa dang mi byed par ro //
translated: Giving and not giving by practicing the field of giving and not giving.

original: de'i phyir sbyin pa sbyin mi bya //
analyzed: de'i phyir sbyin pa sbyin mi bya //
translated: Therefore, do not give the gift.

original: zhes pa ni de ltar brtags shing dpyad nas sbyin par bya ba ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ni de ltar brtags shing dpyad nas sbyin par bya ba ma yin pa'o //
translated: This is not to be given by examining and analyzing in that way.

original: spyod pa ni glu dang ldan pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa tsa rya pa yin na /
analyzed: spyod pa ni glu dang ldan pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa tsa rya pa yin na /
translated: Conduct is the practice of union endowed with song.

original: 'dir ji ltar byed ce na /
analyzed: 'dir ji ltar byed ce na /
translated: How is it done here?

original: 'dir ni phyag rgya chen po rang snang ba'i man ngag glu gar dang snyoms 'jug yongs su rdzogs pa ste /
analyzed: 'dir ni phyag rgya chen po rang snang ba'i man ngag glu gar dang snyoms 'jug yongs su rdzogs pa ste /
translated: Here, the intimate instruction of the self-appearance of mahāmudrā is the complete song, dance, and union.

original: de yang bza' bca' la sogs pa tshigs su bcad pa gnyis kyis bstan te /
analyzed: de yang bza' bca' la sogs pa tshigs su bcad pa gnyis kyis bstan te /
translated: That is also explained by two verses on food, drink, and so on.

original: bla ma dam pa'i zhal las shes par bya'o //
analyzed: bla ma dam pa'i zhal las shes par bya'o //
translated: It should be understood from the mouth of the sublime guru.

original: da ni spyod pa la 'jug pa'i tshul spyir shes par bya ba'i tshul /🔽dngos grub rnyed pa'i slob ma gang //
analyzed: da ni spyod pa la 'jug pa'i tshul spyir shes par bya ba'i tshul / dngos grub rnyed pa'i slob ma gang //
translated: Now, in order to understand the general way of engaging in conduct,🔽the disciple who has attained power

original: zhes pa ni slob ma gang gis dngos grub thob pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ni slob ma gang gis dngos grub thob pa'o //
translated: is the disciple who has attained power.

original: yang de dang ngo //
analyzed: yang de dang ngo //
translated: Again, that is so.

original: yang dag ye shes snang ba'o //
analyzed: yang dag ye shes snang ba'o //
translated: is the light of perfect pristine consciousness.

original: zhes pa ni de nyid dngos grub yin pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ni de nyid dngos grub yin pa'o //
translated: This is the accomplishment of thatness.

original: yang na de yis kyang ngo //
analyzed: yang na de yis kyang ngo //
translated: Or, it is also by that.

original: mnar med spang ba'i rgyu yi phyir //
analyzed: mnar med spang ba'i rgyu yi phyir //
translated: In order to abandon the Avīci hell,

original: zhes pa ni yon tan de yis mi bskyod pa ste bla ma las byung ba gtso bo yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: zhes pa ni yon tan de yis mi bskyod pa ste bla ma las byung ba gtso bo yin pa'i phyir /
translated: By that quality, it is Akṣobhya, because it is primarily from the guru.

original: 'o na ji ltar bya zhe na gong ma lta bu grub pas kyang bla ma la phyag btsal ba'o //
analyzed: 'o na ji ltar bya zhe na gong ma lta bu grub pas kyang bla ma la phyag btsal ba'o //
translated: If it is asked what is it like, it is like the above.

original: da ni spyod pa'i rang bzhin dam tshig dang sdom pa bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa gnyis ston to //
analyzed: da ni spyod pa'i rang bzhin dam tshig dang sdom pa bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa gnyis ston to //
translated: Now, in order to explain the nature of conduct, the samaya and vows, two verses are presented.

original: de yang go rims bzlog ste bstan pa dang bshad par gnas pa'o //
analyzed: de yang go rims bzlog ste bstan pa dang bshad par gnas pa'o //
translated: Moreover, they are presented in reverse order: the explanation and the topic.

original: de yang zhabs kyi tshig rkang gnyis dang dam tshig sdom pa rnam par grol zhes pa ni dam tshig gi bya ba'i tshul lo //
analyzed: de yang zhabs kyi tshig rkang gnyis dang dam tshig sdom pa rnam par grol zhes pa ni dam tshig gi bya ba'i tshul lo //
translated: Moreover, the two lines of the conclusion and “the liberation of the samaya vows” are the method of samaya conduct.

original: sdom pa ni bsrung ba'i tshul nas so //
analyzed: sdom pa ni bsrung ba'i tshul nas so //
translated: Vows are from the perspective of guarding.

original: rnal 'byor ldan pas spyod pa byed //
analyzed: rnal 'byor ldan pas spyod pa byed //
translated: The conduct of the yogin is performed.

original: ces pa ni mi byed pa dang / spyod pa gnyis ka don gcig ste mnyam pa'i don @263b dang ldan pas so //
analyzed: ces pa ni mi byed pa dang / spyod pa gnyis ka don gcig ste mnyam pa'i don @263b dang ldan pas so //
translated: This means that one does not do both, and has the meaning of equality.

original: de dag bshad pa ni /
analyzed: de dag bshad pa ni /
translated: Their explanation is:

original: bslab dang cho ga rnam par grol //
analyzed: bslab dang cho ga rnam par grol //
translated: Training, ritual, and liberation,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: and so forth.

original: srog gcod pa spang ba dang / gos gsum brje ba dang / khrus bzhi la sogs pa sdom pa mi byed pa dang sbyin sreg mchod sbyin zhes dkyil 'khor pa dang bsam gtan dang sngags dang phyag rgya dang phrin las sogs pa bya ba thams cad kyang mi byed de /
analyzed: srog gcod pa spang ba dang / gos gsum brje ba dang / khrus bzhi la sogs pa sdom pa mi byed pa dang sbyin sreg mchod sbyin zhes dkyil 'khor pa dang bsam gtan dang sngags dang phyag rgya dang phrin las sogs pa bya ba thams cad kyang mi byed de /
translated: One does not take the vow of abandoning killing, changing one's three garments, bathing four times, and so forth, and one does not do any of the actions of fire sacrifice, burnt offerings, and so on, or the maṇḍala, concentration, mantra, seal, and activity, and so on.

original: de dag thams cad kyang ro mnyam pa'i phyir gnyis ka mtshungs so //
analyzed: de dag thams cad kyang ro mnyam pa'i phyir gnyis ka mtshungs so //
translated: Since all of those are of equal taste, both are the same.

original: da ni spyod pa'i rnam pa'i tshul spyir bstan pa'i phyir nges par sngon du zhes pa la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gcig gis bstan te //
analyzed: da ni spyod pa'i rnam pa'i tshul spyir bstan pa'i phyir nges par sngon du zhes pa la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gcig gis bstan te //
translated: Now, in order to generally teach the mode of the conduct, one verse is taught, beginning with “definitely beforehand.”

original: go sla'o // de yang bla ma bu la ha ri ba'i lugs kyis smyon pa'i brtul zhugs chen po'i rnam pa'am ngo bo yin par 'chad do //
analyzed: go sla'o // de yang bla ma bu la ha ri ba'i lugs kyis smyon pa'i brtul zhugs chen po'i rnam pa'am ngo bo yin par 'chad do //
translated: Moreover, it is explained that the system of Guru Bhusuku is the nature or essence of the great practice of a madman.🔽Now, in order to generally teach the reason for conduct,

analyzed: da ni spyod pa'i rgyu mtshan spyir bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: it is said:

analyzed: sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir // rtag tu snying rje zhes pa ste gzhan gyi don du'o //

analyzed: btung bar bya / rnal 'byor btung dga' zhes pa ni bdag gi don du ste /
translated: for the sake of others.🔽One should drink the beer of the yoginis.

analyzed: de yang sam ba la'i sgras yang dag pa'i rgyags zhes bya'o //

original: sam ni mnyam pa'am yang dag pa'o //
analyzed: sam ni mnyam pa'am yang dag pa'o //

original: ba la ni stobs te bde ba'o //
analyzed: ba la ni stobs te bde ba'o //

analyzed: rnal 'byor btung ba gzhan gyis bzi pa med ces pa ni lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba'i rgyags yin pas tshim pa med pa'i phyir ro //

original: spyod pa 'og ma gnyis ka la gong du bstan pa'i dngos po bshad pa spyir 'gro ba ni gnyis ka la sbyar ro //
analyzed: spyod pa 'og ma gnyis ka la gong du bstan pa'i dngos po bshad pa spyir 'gro ba ni gnyis ka la sbyar ro //

original: spyod pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o /
analyzed: spyod pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o /

analyzed: // / de nas zhes pa ni rjes la ste spyod pa'i yan lag tu'o //

analyzed: sam khi ta ste don zur gyis ston pas na lus kyi brda'o // ngag gi sam g'i ta'am /

analyzed: da ni brda'i dgongs pa bstan pa'i phyir / gang gi spun dang sring mor yang //

analyzed: gsang ba ltar bshad pa ni gsang ba'i gnas kyi khyad par te /

original: rtsa gnas brgya pa'i bye brag la ci rigs par sbyar ro //
analyzed: rtsa gnas brgya pa'i bye brag la ci rigs par sbyar ro //
translated: which is applied to the specific one hundred channel locations.

original: de kho na nyid ltar bshad pa ni /
analyzed: de kho na nyid ltar bshad pa ni /
translated: The explanation according to reality is as follows:

original: gnas ni rab tu dga' bar brjod //
analyzed: gnas ni rab tu dga' bar brjod //
translated: The place is said to be Very Joyful.

original: nye gnas dri ma med ces bya /
analyzed: nye gnas dri ma med ces bya /
translated: The nearby place is called Stainless.

original: zhing ni 'od byed pa yin te //
analyzed: zhing ni 'od byed pa yin te //
translated: The field is the Illuminating.

original: nye ba'i zhing ni 'od 'phro can //
analyzed: nye ba'i zhing ni 'od 'phro can //
translated: The adjacent field is the Radiant.

original: tshando lnga pa sbyang dka' ba //🔽nye ba'i tshando mngon du gyur //
analyzed: tshando lnga pa sbyang dka' ba // nye ba'i tshando mngon du gyur //
translated: The town is the Difficult to Conquer.🔽The adjacent town is the Face to Face.

original: de bzhin 'du ba ring du song //
analyzed: de bzhin 'du ba ring du song //
translated: The assembly is the Far Reaching.

original: nye ba'i 'du ba mi g-yo ba //
analyzed: nye ba'i 'du ba mi g-yo ba //
translated: The adjacent assembly is the Immovable.

original: 'thung gcod legs pa'i blo gros te //
analyzed: 'thung gcod legs pa'i blo gros te //
translated: The charnel ground is the Excellent Intelligence.

original: nye ba'i 'thung gcod chos kyi sprin //
analyzed: nye ba'i 'thung gcod chos kyi sprin //
translated: The adjacent charnel ground is the Cloud of Dharma.

original: dur khrod kun du 'od kyis //
analyzed: dur khrod kun du 'od kyis //
translated: The charnel ground is the Everywhere Light.

original: nye ba'i 'thung gcod bsgrun du med //
analyzed: nye ba'i 'thung gcod bsgrun du med //
translated: The adjacent charnel ground is the Incomparable.

original: 'di rnams sa ni bcu gnyis so //
analyzed: 'di rnams sa ni bcu gnyis so //
translated: These are the twelve stages.

original: rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sa bcu gsum pa ni mthar thug pa ste /
analyzed: rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sa bcu gsum pa ni mthar thug pa ste /
translated: The thirteenth stage of the vajra holder is the ultimate.

original: pha rol tu phyin pa bas ni mi thob po //
analyzed: pha rol tu phyin pa bas ni mi thob po //
translated: It is not obtained by the perfections.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: rgyu'i khyad par las 'bras bu'i khyad par 'byung ba'i phyir ro //🔽slob dpon la la ni pha rol tu phyin pa dang / gsang @266a * //
analyzed: rgyu'i khyad par las 'bras bu'i khyad par 'byung ba'i phyir ro // slob dpon la la ni pha rol tu phyin pa dang / gsang @266a * //
translated: Because the result is distinguished by the distinction of the cause.

original: sngags kyi spyod pa gnyis ka la brten nas lam so so'i 'bras bu so sor thob par 'dod do //
analyzed: sngags kyi spyod pa gnyis ka la brten nas lam so so'i 'bras bu so sor thob par 'dod do //
translated: Some masters assert that the result of each path is obtained by relying on both the perfections and the mantra conduct.

original: slob dpon la la dag ni pha rol tu phyin pas ni nges par 'byung ba thob kyi mthar thug pa ni thob par mi 'dod do //
analyzed: slob dpon la la dag ni pha rol tu phyin pas ni nges par 'byung ba thob kyi mthar thug pa ni thob par mi 'dod do //
translated: Some masters say: One obtains the result of definite release by the perfections, but not the ultimate result.🔽Also, a scripture says:🔽“Son of the family! You should practice various kinds of austerities without realizing the suchness of the tathāgatas, thinking, ‘How can I fully awaken?’”

original: lung las kyang rigs kyi bu khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis de kho na nyid ma rtogs par dka' ba rnam pa sna tshogs pa spyod cing ji ltar na mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya snyam zhes gsungs pa dang slob dpon la la dag
analyzed: lung las kyang rigs kyi bu khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis de kho na nyid ma rtogs par dka' ba rnam pa sna tshogs pa spyod cing ji ltar na mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya snyam zhes gsungs pa dang slob dpon la la dag
translated: And some masters say:

original: gis kyang / 'dis ni mthar thug mi thob ste //
analyzed: gis kyang / 'dis ni mthar thug mi thob ste //
translated: “One does not obtain the ultimate by this.”🔽And:

original: zhes gsungs pa dang / rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sa dge ba //
analyzed: zhes gsungs pa dang / rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sa dge ba //
translated: The stage of the vajra holder

original: bcu gsum par yang gsungs pa yin //
analyzed: bcu gsum par yang gsungs pa yin //
translated: Is also said to be the thirteenth.🔽And:🔽The teaching that one does not obtain the ultimate.

original: zhes gsungs pa dang / mthar thug pa mi thob par bstan pa dang / yang lung las /
analyzed: zhes gsungs pa dang / mthar thug pa mi thob par bstan pa dang / yang lung las /
translated: Also, a scripture says:

original: theg pa gsum gyi nges 'byung la //
analyzed: theg pa gsum gyi nges 'byung la //
translated: The definite releases of the three vehicles

original: theg pa gcig gi 'bras bur gnas //🔽zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: theg pa gcig gi 'bras bur gnas //🔽zhes gsungs so //
translated: Abide in the result of the single vehicle.

original: pha rol tu phyin pa'i theg pas ni sa bcu gsum pa bshad pa med do //
analyzed: pha rol tu phyin pa'i theg pas ni sa bcu gsum pa bshad pa med do //
translated: The vehicle of the perfections does not explain a thirteenth stage.

original: rigs pa ni rgyu'i khyad par las 'bras bu'i khyad par yod de /
analyzed: rigs pa ni rgyu'i khyad par las 'bras bu'i khyad par yod de /
translated: The reason is that there is a difference in the result due to a difference in the cause.

original: ji srid du phyag rgya chen po don rang gi mtshan nyid nyams su ma myong bar dngos po rnams kyi de kho na nyid mi rtogs te /
analyzed: ji srid du phyag rgya chen po don rang gi mtshan nyid nyams su ma myong bar dngos po rnams kyi de kho na nyid mi rtogs te /
translated: As long as one does not experience the intrinsic identity of the meaning of the great seal, one does not understand the thatness of things.

original: de'i phyir na yang mthar thug pa mi thob po //
analyzed: de'i phyir na yang mthar thug pa mi thob po //
translated: Therefore, one does not attain the ultimate.

original: pha rol tu phyin par ni rjes su dpag pas gtan la 'bebs par byed pas lta ba yang spyi tsam gtan la 'bebs /
analyzed: pha rol tu phyin par ni rjes su dpag pas gtan la 'bebs par byed pas lta ba yang spyi tsam gtan la 'bebs /
translated: In the vehicle of the perfections, one establishes by means of inference, so the view is also established as a mere generality.

original: sgom pa yang yid au li ka snyam du sems pa spyi'i sgom pa tsam ste /
analyzed: sgom pa yang yid au li ka snyam du sems pa spyi'i sgom pa tsam ste /
translated: The meditation is also a mere general meditation, thinking, “The mind is clear light.”

original: de'i phyir mthar thug pa mi thob pa'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir mthar thug pa mi thob pa'o //
translated: Therefore, one does not attain the ultimate.

original: de dag gi gzhung gis kyang thabs rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i nus pa'i mthu ni dgag par mi nus la mngon sum dang rjes su dpag par ni thun mong du mtshungs pas rgyu'i khams kyi khyad par ni de tsam mo //
analyzed: de dag gi gzhung gis kyang thabs rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i nus pa'i mthu ni dgag par mi nus la mngon sum dang rjes su dpag par ni thun mong du mtshungs pas rgyu'i khams kyi khyad par ni de tsam mo //
translated: The texts of those [Buddhists] cannot refute the power of the potential of the method of dependent origination. Since they are the same in being commonly direct perception and inference, the difference in the element of the cause is just that.

original: rigs pa mang du yod kyang 'ding ma spros so //
analyzed: rigs pa mang du yod kyang 'ding ma spros so //
translated: Although there are many reasonings, I will not elaborate further.

original: gong gi phyi'i gnas rgyas par bshad par 'dod nas /
analyzed: gong gi phyi'i gnas rgyas par bshad par 'dod nas /
translated: If one wishes to explain the outer topics in detail,

original: kye bcom ldan 'das gnas la sogs pa gang lags zhes bya ste /
analyzed: kye bcom ldan 'das gnas la sogs pa gang lags zhes bya ste /
translated: one should say, Kye ma! Bhagavan, what are the abodes and so on?

original: rdo rje snying pos gsol ba zhes pa kha skong ngo //
analyzed: rdo rje snying pos gsol ba zhes pa kha skong ngo //
translated: The Vajra Heart's request is to be supplemented.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa zhes pa la sogs pa yul sum cu rtsa gnyis la sogs pa go sla'o //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa zhes pa la sogs pa yul sum cu rtsa gnyis la sogs pa go sla'o //
translated: The Bhagavan's reply, The abodes are the thirty-two places, and so on, are easy to understand.

original: yang dus bstan pa'i phyir cung zad go rims bzlog ste /
analyzed: yang dus bstan pa'i phyir cung zad go rims bzlog ste /
translated: In order to explain the time, I will reverse the order slightly.

original: kye bcom ldan 'das nyi ma gang lags zhes dris pa'o //
analyzed: kye bcom ldan 'das nyi ma gang lags zhes dris pa'o //
translated: The question is, Kye ma! Bhagavan, what is the sun?

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa zhes pa ni lan ston mkhan sdud pa pos brjod @266b pa'o ;
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa zhes pa ni lan ston mkhan sdud pa pos brjod @266b pa'o ;
translated: The Bhagavān said is the compiler's statement of the answer.

original: / sems can gyi la sogs pa tshigs su bcad pa gcig gis ni zhal byis bzhes pa ste /
analyzed: / sems can gyi la sogs pa tshigs su bcad pa gcig gis ni zhal byis bzhes pa ste /
translated: In one verse, the promise to explain the sentient beings, etc.

original: kyang zhes pa ni nyin mo 'tshog cing 'jug pa'i dus so //
analyzed: kyang zhes pa ni nyin mo 'tshog cing 'jug pa'i dus so //
translated: Also indicates the time of gathering and entering during the day.

original: mtshan mo spyod pa'i dus kyang mtshon no //🔽dus de nyid ni yi dgas zla phyed de tshig rkang gnyis so //
analyzed: mtshan mo spyod pa'i dus kyang mtshon no // dus de nyid ni yi dgas zla phyed de tshig rkang gnyis so //
translated: It also indicates the time of conduct at night.🔽That very time is the fortnight of pretas, two lines.

original: yi dags zla phyed ni mar ngo'o //
analyzed: yi dags zla phyed ni mar ngo'o //
translated: The fortnight of pretas is the waning fortnight.

original: bcu bzhi ni nyi shu dgu'o //
analyzed: bcu bzhi ni nyi shu dgu'o //
translated: The fourteenth is the twenty-ninth.

original: brgyad pa ni nyi shu gsum mo //
analyzed: brgyad pa ni nyi shu gsum mo //
translated: The eighth is the twenty-third.

original: da ni spyod pa'am tshogs kyi rdzas bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: da ni spyod pa'am tshogs kyi rdzas bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: Now, in order to explain the substances of conduct or accumulation,

original: rgyal mtshan la sogs pa tshigs su bcad pa gnyis kyis bstan te /
analyzed: rgyal mtshan la sogs pa tshigs su bcad pa gnyis kyis bstan te /
translated: it is explained in two verses, beginning with the banner.

original: de yang rdzas su bshad pa'i tshe ni zas su nye bar longs spyod pa ni gnyug ma dang sgrub pa'i rdzas de rgyal mtshan ni dpyangs te shi ba'o //
analyzed: de yang rdzas su bshad pa'i tshe ni zas su nye bar longs spyod pa ni gnyug ma dang sgrub pa'i rdzas de rgyal mtshan ni dpyangs te shi ba'o //
translated: Moreover, when explained as substances, the enjoyment as food is the fundamental and accomplished substances. The banner is one who has died hanging.

original: mtshon bsnun pa ni dpa' bo g-yul ngor shi ba'i sha'o //
analyzed: mtshon bsnun pa ni dpa' bo g-yul ngor shi ba'i sha'o //
translated: The flesh of one slain by a weapon is the flesh of a hero who dies in battle.🔽The flesh of one who has had seven births is the flesh of one who has had seven births.

original: lan bdun pa ni skye ba bdun pa'i sha ste 'og nas de nyid brtags pa'i thabs 'chad do //
analyzed: lan bdun pa ni skye ba bdun pa'i sha ste 'og nas de nyid brtags pa'i thabs 'chad do //
translated: The method of examining that will be explained below.

original: bsgrub pa ni yul dang bsam pa sbyor bas gnang ba ste /
analyzed: bsgrub pa ni yul dang bsam pa sbyor bas gnang ba ste /
translated: The flesh of one who is accomplished is one who is permitted by the object, intention, and application.

original: de bsad pa'i sha ste brtag pa phyi mar 'chad do //
analyzed: de bsad pa'i sha ste brtag pa phyi mar 'chad do //
translated: The flesh of one who is slain will be explained in the next chapter.

original: lhan cig skyes pa grub pa de'i tshe rgyal mtshan ni khams dang bcas pa ste bya rog gi gdong can no //
analyzed: lhan cig skyes pa grub pa de'i tshe rgyal mtshan ni khams dang bcas pa ste bya rog gi gdong can no //
translated: When that is accomplished, the banner is the one with the element, which is the crow-faced one.

original: mtshon bsnun ni rin chen ze 'bru dang bya rog gi gdong phrad pa'o //
analyzed: mtshon bsnun ni rin chen ze 'bru dang bya rog gi gdong phrad pa'o //
translated: The one slain by a weapon is the one with the pistil of jewels and the crow-face.

original: lan bdun pa yang bza' bar bya //
analyzed: lan bdun pa yang bza' bar bya //
translated: One should also eat the one who has had seven births.

original: zhes pa ni zla ba dang mi 'bral bar nyi ma dang longs spyod pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ni zla ba dang mi 'bral bar nyi ma dang longs spyod pa'o //
translated: This means that one should enjoy the sun without being separated from the moon.

original: 'bad pas snying rje bskyed pa yis //
analyzed: 'bad pas snying rje bskyed pa yis //
translated: One should generate compassion with effort.

original: zhes pa ni bla ma la 'bad pa'i man ngag gis so //
analyzed: zhes pa ni bla ma la 'bad pa'i man ngag gis so //
translated: This means with the intimate instruction of effort in the guru.

original: gsad par bya ba brjod pa nyid //
analyzed: gsad par bya ba brjod pa nyid //
translated: The one to be slain is said to be

original: ces pa ni nyon mongs pa dang rtog pa'i tshogs bkag nas bde bar slong ba'o //
analyzed: ces pa ni nyon mongs pa dang rtog pa'i tshogs bkag nas bde bar slong ba'o //
translated: This is the arousal of bliss by blocking the groups of afflictions and concepts.

original: snying rje med pas mi 'grub pas //
analyzed: snying rje med pas mi 'grub pas //
translated: Since one does not succeed without compassion,

original: zhes pa ni man ngag dang mi ldan na'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ni man ngag dang mi ldan na'o //
translated: this is the lack of intimate instruction.

original: de phyir snying rje bskyed pa nyid //
analyzed: de phyir snying rje bskyed pa nyid //
translated: Therefore, one should generate compassion.

original: ces pa ni man ngag nyid do //
analyzed: ces pa ni man ngag nyid do //
translated: This is the intimate instruction.

original: cho ga'i gtso bo ni las kyi phyag rgya lus kyi 'khrul 'khor dang / rtsa'i 'khrul 'khor dang rlung gi 'khrul 'khor te man ngag gis 'gegs pa ni des rtog pa 'gegs pa'o //
analyzed: cho ga'i gtso bo ni las kyi phyag rgya lus kyi 'khrul 'khor dang / rtsa'i 'khrul 'khor dang rlung gi 'khrul 'khor te man ngag gis 'gegs pa ni des rtog pa 'gegs pa'o //
translated: The main ritual is the blocking of concepts by the blocking of the body maṇḍala, the blocking of the nāḍī maṇḍala, and the blocking of the vāyu maṇḍala with the intimate instruction.

original: rang lus ni rgyal mtshan zhes pa spyi'o //
analyzed: rang lus ni rgyal mtshan zhes pa spyi'o //
translated: One’s body is the banner.

original: mtshon bsnun ni lte ba nas phar 'od zer gyis bsregs pas lan bdun pa ni mtshon pa yang dang yang du rtsa gnyis nas lam mtshon pa'o //
analyzed: mtshon bsnun ni lte ba nas phar 'od zer gyis bsregs pas lan bdun pa ni mtshon pa yang dang yang du rtsa gnyis nas lam mtshon pa'o //
translated: The weapon is the fire that burns from the navel.

original: 'bad pa ni lus ngag gis so //
analyzed: 'bad pa ni lus ngag gis so //
translated: The effort is physical and verbal.

original: snying rje ni nang gi bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: snying rje ni nang gi bsgom pa'o //
translated: Compassion is the inner meditation.

original: bsad pa ni rtog pa'o //
analyzed: bsad pa ni rtog pa'o //
translated: Killing is the concept.

original: snying rje med ni nang gi nyams med pa'o //
analyzed: snying rje med ni nang gi nyams med pa'o //
translated: Without compassion is the lack of inner experience.

original: gdug pa ni rtog pa'o //
analyzed: gdug pa ni rtog pa'o //
translated: The poison is the conceptualization.

original: cho ga'i gtso bo ni gtum mo sbar ba'o //
analyzed: cho ga'i gtso bo ni gtum mo sbar ba'o //
translated: The chief rite is the kindling of the inner heat.

original: dbyer med phyag rgya chen po ni @267a * //
analyzed: dbyer med phyag rgya chen po ni @267a * //
translated: The great seal is the indivisibility of the two.

original: brten pa chos nas 'jug pa'i rgyal mchan ni snang ba'o //
analyzed: brten pa chos nas 'jug pa'i rgyal mchan ni snang ba'o //
translated: The banner of engagement is the appearance.

original: mtshon bsnun ni shes rab kyi bdag med pa'o //
analyzed: mtshon bsnun ni shes rab kyi bdag med pa'o //
translated: The stabbing with the weapon is the selflessness of wisdom.

original: lan bdun pa ni snang ba stong pa dbyer med pa yang dang yang du sgom pa rang gi rtsol bas so //
analyzed: lan bdun pa ni snang ba stong pa dbyer med pa yang dang yang du sgom pa rang gi rtsol bas so //
translated: The seven steps are the repeated meditation on the indivisibility of appearance and emptiness, by one's own effort.

original: snying rje ni thabs te sems can la bskyed pa'o //
analyzed: snying rje ni thabs te sems can la bskyed pa'o //
translated: The compassion is the method, which is generated for sentient beings.

original: gdug pa gzhug pa ni dngos por zhen pa snang ba'o //
analyzed: gdug pa gzhug pa ni dngos por zhen pa snang ba'o //
translated: The introduction of the poison is the appearance of attachment to things.

original: cho ga'i gtso bo ni man ngag gi stobs kyis dngos po'i chos la brten nas rang la chos nyid 'char ba'o //
analyzed: cho ga'i gtso bo ni man ngag gi stobs kyis dngos po'i chos la brten nas rang la chos nyid 'char ba'o //
translated: The chief rite is the arising of reality in oneself, based on the phenomena of things, by the power of the esoteric instructions.

original: brten pa nang nas 'jug pa'i rgyal mtshan ni shes rab lha mo bla na med pa gnyug ma'i dbang po'o //
analyzed: brten pa nang nas 'jug pa'i rgyal mtshan ni shes rab lha mo bla na med pa gnyug ma'i dbang po'o //
translated: The banner of engagement is the unsurpassed wisdom goddess, the innate sense organ.

original: mtshon bsnun ni ye shes rang 'bar ba ste des bskyed pa'i ye shes kyi dngos po mtshan ma 'joms pa ste /
analyzed: mtshon bsnun ni ye shes rang 'bar ba ste des bskyed pa'i ye shes kyi dngos po mtshan ma 'joms pa ste /
translated: The weapon strike is the self-arisen gnosis, which destroys the signifiers that are the entities of gnosis that are generated by that [gnosis].

original: gnyis po dag ni rnam dpyad na /
analyzed: gnyis po dag ni rnam dpyad na /
translated: When those two are analyzed,

original: gnyis med ye shes rang 'bar 'gyur //
analyzed: gnyis med ye shes rang 'bar 'gyur //
translated: nondual gnosis is self-arisen.

original: zhes pa'o // lan bdun pa dbang po rang snang ngo //
analyzed: zhes pa'o // lan bdun pa dbang po rang snang ngo //
translated: The seven replies are the self-appearance of the sense organs.

original: thams cad gdug pa gzhug pa ni yid kyi rgyu ba kun no //
analyzed: thams cad gdug pa gzhug pa ni yid kyi rgyu ba kun no //
translated: All are the entry of the wicked, all movements of the mind.

original: cho ga'i gtso bo ni phyag rgya chen po'o //
analyzed: cho ga'i gtso bo ni phyag rgya chen po'o //
translated: The principal rite is the great seal.

original: dgag par bya ba ni yid dang ba'i thabs so //
analyzed: dgag par bya ba ni yid dang ba'i thabs so //
translated: What is to be stopped is the method of mental faith.

original: glegs bam la lar bsgrub par bya //
analyzed: glegs bam la lar bsgrub par bya //
translated: In some texts, it is “to be accomplished.”

original: zhes pa ni gnyug ma'i dbang dang po'i thabs so //
analyzed: zhes pa ni gnyug ma'i dbang dang po'i thabs so //
translated: That is the method of the first, innate empowerment.

original: da ni yongs su rdzogs pa'i rim pa spyi'i don du shes par bya ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: da ni yongs su rdzogs pa'i rim pa spyi'i don du shes par bya ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Now, in order to understand the general meaning of the stage of completion,

original: de la 'di ltar lta ba nyid //
analyzed: de la 'di ltar lta ba nyid //
translated: the view is like this.

original: ces pa ni tshig rkang gnyis kyis lta ba ston par khas len pa'o ;
analyzed: ces pa ni tshig rkang gnyis kyis lta ba ston par khas len pa'o ;
translated: These two lines accept that the view is taught.

original: / nyin mo bcom ldan rdo rje can //
analyzed: / nyin mo bcom ldan rdo rje can //
translated: The bhagavān during the day is the vajra holder.

original: zhes bya ba ni chos kun snang ba bde ba chen po ni rdo rje sems dpar blta'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni chos kun snang ba bde ba chen po ni rdo rje sems dpar blta'o //
translated: All phenomena are the appearance of great bliss, which is to be seen as Vajrasattva.

original: mtshan mo shes rab brtag par bya //
analyzed: mtshan mo shes rab brtag par bya //
translated: Night is to be understood as wisdom.

original: zhes pa ni chos kun stong pa bdag med pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ni chos kun stong pa bdag med pa'o //
translated: All phenomena are empty, selfless.

original: nyin mo mtshan mos mtshon te /
analyzed: nyin mo mtshan mos mtshon te /
translated: Day is symbolized by night.

original: de'i mtshams shes pa ni snang ba dang stong pa dbyer med pa skye ba'o //
analyzed: de'i mtshams shes pa ni snang ba dang stong pa dbyer med pa skye ba'o //
translated: The knowledge of the juncture is the arising of the inseparability of appearance and emptiness.

original: yang nyin mo'i 'char ba ste dga' ba dang mchog dga'o //
analyzed: yang nyin mo'i 'char ba ste dga' ba dang mchog dga'o //
translated: Again, day is the arising of joy and supreme joy.

original: mtshan mo ste dga' bral gyis mtshon nas mtshams su lhan cig skyes zhes bya'o //
analyzed: mtshan mo ste dga' bral gyis mtshon nas mtshams su lhan cig skyes zhes bya'o //
translated: Night is symbolized by the separation from joy, and the juncture is called “coemergent.”

original: da ni spyod pa bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: da ni spyod pa bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: Now, in order to teach the conduct, it says:

original: mi bya cung zad yod ma yin //
analyzed: mi bya cung zad yod ma yin //
translated: There is nothing at all that is not to be done.

original: zhes pa ni bdag med pas na'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ni bdag med pas na'o //
translated: Since there is no self,

original: rtag tu mi bza' yod ma yin //
analyzed: rtag tu mi bza' yod ma yin //
translated: There is nothing at all that is not to be eaten.

original: zhes pa bza' ba ni spyod pa ste /
analyzed: zhes pa bza' ba ni spyod pa ste /
translated: Eating is the conduct,

original: dga' ba de'i rnam pa yin pas so //
analyzed: dga' ba de'i rnam pa yin pas so //
translated: because it is the aspect of joy.

original: 'di la mi bsam yod ma yin //
analyzed: 'di la mi bsam yod ma yin //
translated: There is nothing at all that is not to be contemplated.

original: zhes pa ni lhan cig skyes pa las log na med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: zhes pa ni lhan cig skyes pa las log na med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because if one turns away from the coemergent, it does not exist.

original: bzang ngan mi smra gang yang med //
analyzed: bzang ngan mi smra gang yang med //
translated: One should not speak of good or bad, of anything at all.

original: ces pa ni don gyis stong zhing brdzun pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ces pa ni don gyis stong zhing brdzun pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because [the world] is empty of meaning and false.

original: de yang nyin mo'i ngos nas thams cad bya ba'o //
analyzed: de yang nyin mo'i ngos nas thams cad bya ba'o //
translated: Moreover, from the perspective of the daytime, everything is to be done.

original: @267b mtshan mo'i ngos nas cir yang byar med pa'o //
analyzed: @267b mtshan mo'i ngos nas cir yang byar med pa'o //
translated: From the perspective of the night, nothing at all is to be done.

original: ji ltar bdag nyid ni rang spyod pa'i nyams so //
analyzed: ji ltar bdag nyid ni rang spyod pa'i nyams so //
translated: Just as one's own is the experience of one's own conduct,

original: de ltar gzhan ni yul rang shugs kyis bkag pa'i phyir bya rog lding chags lta bu'o //
analyzed: de ltar gzhan ni yul rang shugs kyis bkag pa'i phyir bya rog lding chags lta bu'o //
translated: so another is like a crow hovering, because the object is naturally blocked by oneself.

original: de bzhin bdag ni ci zhes dris pa dang / nga mchog nyid de lhan cig skyes pa'i ro'o //
analyzed: de bzhin bdag ni ci zhes dris pa dang / nga mchog nyid de lhan cig skyes pa'i ro'o //
translated: When asked, What is one's own? [the answer is] I am supreme, the taste of co-emergence.

original: de yang gzhan shes pas bsgyur na nga dang gzhan gnyis ka yang bdag dang 'dra ba de bzhin no //
analyzed: de yang gzhan shes pas bsgyur na nga dang gzhan gnyis ka yang bdag dang 'dra ba de bzhin no //
translated: Moreover, when that is transformed by the knowledge of another, both I and another are like oneself. It is just so.

original: da ni spyod pa'i phan yon sngags dang phyag rgya bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa phye dang gnyis te go sla'o //
analyzed: da ni spyod pa'i phan yon sngags dang phyag rgya bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa phye dang gnyis te go sla'o //
translated: Now, in order to demonstrate the benefits of conduct and the mantras and mudras, there are two verses. They are easy to understand.

original: da ni bsgom pa bstan pa'i phyir shr'i ni gnyis med la sogs pa tshigs su bcad pa gcig ste /
analyzed: da ni bsgom pa bstan pa'i phyir shr'i ni gnyis med la sogs pa tshigs su bcad pa gcig ste /
translated: Now, in order to teach the meditation, there is one verse beginning with “arising” and so on.

original: lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang ldan pa ste //
analyzed: lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang ldan pa ste //
translated: The connate pristine awareness is endowed with the three doors of liberation.

original: he ni rgyu sogs stong pa nyid kyi sgo'o //
analyzed: he ni rgyu sogs stong pa nyid kyi sgo'o //
translated: He is the door of the emptiness of causes and so on.

original: ru ni tshogs dang bral ba nyid mtshan ma med pa'i sgo'o //
analyzed: ru ni tshogs dang bral ba nyid mtshan ma med pa'i sgo'o //
translated: Ru is the door of the signlessness of being free from the accumulations.

original: ka ni gang du'ang mi gnas pa smon pa med pa'i sgo'o //
analyzed: ka ni gang du'ang mi gnas pa smon pa med pa'i sgo'o //
translated: Ka is the door of the wishlessness of not abiding anywhere.

original: bde ba dang stong pa dbyer med par bsgom zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: bde ba dang stong pa dbyer med par bsgom zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning of “meditate on bliss and emptiness inseparably” is the meaning.

original: da ni 'bras bu bstan pa'i phyir //
analyzed: da ni 'bras bu bstan pa'i phyir //
translated: Now, in order to teach the result,

original: rdo rje thod pa'i sbyor ba yis //
analyzed: rdo rje thod pa'i sbyor ba yis //
translated: the union of the vajra and skull

original: zhes pa ni dgyes pa'i rdo rje dang bdag med pa'i rnal 'byor ro //🔽skye bo gang dang gang rnams kyis //
analyzed: zhes pa ni dgyes pa'i rdo rje dang bdag med pa'i rnal 'byor ro // skye bo gang dang gang rnams kyis //
translated: is the yoga of Hevajra and Nairatma.🔽Whatever beings

original: zhes pa ni sems can gang yang rung ba ste /
analyzed: zhes pa ni sems can gang yang rung ba ste /
translated: are any kind of sentient being.

original: go ku da ha na la sogs so //
analyzed: go ku da ha na la sogs so //
translated: Go, ku, da, ha, na, and so on.

original: mkhas pas sha ni bza' bar bya //
analyzed: mkhas pas sha ni bza' bar bya //
translated: The wise one should eat the meat.

original: zhes pa ni spyang ba dang sbar ba dang rtog pa la mkhas pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ni spyang ba dang sbar ba dang rtog pa la mkhas pa'o //
translated: This is skill in the quick, the slow, and the medium.

original: sems can de dag dbang du 'gyur //
analyzed: sems can de dag dbang du 'gyur //
translated: Those beings are under one's control.

original: zhes pa ni gang 'dod pa dbang du gyur pa dngos kyi yon tan no //
analyzed: zhes pa ni gang 'dod pa dbang du gyur pa dngos kyi yon tan no //
translated: This is the actual benefit, that one has control over whatever one desires.

original: bskyed pa'i rim pa ltar bshad pa'o //
analyzed: bskyed pa'i rim pa ltar bshad pa'o //
translated: This is the explanation according to the creation stage.

original: yang shes rab la bshad pa na rdo rje ni thabs kyi gsang ba'i gnas so //
analyzed: yang shes rab la bshad pa na rdo rje ni thabs kyi gsang ba'i gnas so //
translated: Again, when it is explained in terms of wisdom, the vajra is the secret place of the method.

original: thod pa ni las kyi phyag rgya'i gsang ba'i gnas so ;
analyzed: thod pa ni las kyi phyag rgya'i gsang ba'i gnas so ;
translated: The skull cup is the secret place of the karma consort.

original: / sbyor ba ni snyoms par 'jug go //
analyzed: / sbyor ba ni snyoms par 'jug go //
translated: The union is the meditative stabilization.
